169b4('dul ba): bros so zhes sgra phyung nas/ des de'i ma'i ro de bkur sti byas te song ngo / /sems can sdig pa'i las byas pas ni brtan pa mi rnyed pas/ de mu stegs can gyi gnas dang / dka' thub kyi gnas de dang de dag tu
169b5('dul ba): song ste dris pa/ shes ldan dag las ci zhig byas na/ sdig pa'i las zad par 'gyur/ de na kha cig na re/ mer zhugs shig ces zer ro/ /kha cig na re dug zo zhig ces zer ro/ /kha cig na re g.yang
169b6('dul ba): sar mchongs shig ces zer ro/ /kha cig na re thag pas 'gags te shi zhig ces zer te/ thams cad kyang shi ba'i thabs ston par byed kyi nges par 'byung ba'i thabs ston pa ni 'ga' yang med do/ /de dus
169b7('dul ba): gzhan zhig na/ rgyal byed kyi tshal du song ba dang / des de na dge slong zhig /gang gis sdig pa'i las byas pa/ /dge ba yis ni 'gog byed de/ /nyi zla sprin nas byung ba ltar/ /'jig rten 'dir ni de snang
170a1('dul ba): 'gyur/ /zhes kha ton zer ba thos nas/ des bsams pa/ sdig pa'i las kyang dgag par nus kyi 'di dag gi gan du rab tu 'byung ngo snyam nas/ de dge slong gi gan du
170a2('dul ba): song ste smras pa/ 'phags pa bdag rab tu 'byung bar 'tshal lo/ /des de rab tu phyung zhing bsnyen par rdzogs par byas nas/ de shin tu brtson 'grus brtsams te bklags par brtsams so/ /des klog cing
170a3('dul ba): kha ton byed pa na/ sde snod gsum bklags shing sde snod gsum dang ldan pa/ rig pa dang grol ba'i spobs pa can du gyur to/ /de la dge slong dag gis smras pa/ tshe dang ldan pa khyod brtson 'grus 'dis
170a4('dul ba): ci zhig don du gnyer/ des smras pa/ sdig pa'i las zad par bya'o/ /khyod kyis sdig pa'i las ci byas/ ma bsad do/ /ci ma ma'am/ 'on te skyed ma mo yin/ des smras pa/ skyed ma mo yin no zhes
170a5('dul ba): zer ba'i skabs de/ bcom ldan 'das la dge slong rnams kyis gsol pa dang / de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis dge slong rnams la bka' stsal pa/ dge slong dag 'di ni gang zag ma bzad pa bsnyil bar
170a6('dul ba): 'os pa yin te/ dge slong dag gang zag ma bsad pa ni/ chos 'dul ba 'di la mi skye ba'i chos can yin pas/ dge slong dag khyed kyis/ gang zag ma bsad pa chos 'dul ba 'di las bsnyil bar
170a7('dul ba): bya'o/ /'ga' zhig gi gan du rab tu 'byung bar 'dod pa 'ongs na des de la ma bsad pa ma yin nam zhes dri bar bya'o/ /ma dris par rab tu 'byin par byed na 'gal tshabs can du 'gyur ro/ /des
170b1('dul ba): bsams pa/ cid 'bab par bya'am/ mtha' 'khob tu 'gro bar bya snyam nas/ des mtha' 'khob tu song ste/ khyim bdag gcig rjes su 'jug par byas so/ /des mngon par dad pas/ de'i phyir gtsug
170b2('dul ba): lag khang brtsig tu bcug ste/ de phyogs dang yul tha dad pa na 'khod pa'i dge slong dag gnas shing de'i gdams ngag gis mang po dag gis dgra bcom pa nyid mngon du byas so/ /de dus gzhan zhig na na
170b3('dul ba): bar gyur nas/ rtsa ba dang / sdong bu dang / lo ma dang / me tog dang / 'bras bu'i sman dag gis rim gror byas na/ nyams dmas pa nyid du gyur nas/ des lhan cig gnas pa rnams la smras pa/ tshe
170b4('dul ba): dang ldan pa dag kho bo'i phyir dge 'dun la bsro khang gyis shig / de rnams kyi de'i phyir bsro khang byas so/ /bsags pa kun gyi mtha' zad cing / /mthon po rnams kyi mtha' ltung 'gyur/ /phrad pa'i mtha'
170b5('dul ba): ni bral pa ste/ gson pa'i mtha' ni 'chi pa yin/ zhes bya ba yin pas/ de shi zhing dus la bab nas/ sems can dmyal pa chen po mnar med par skyes so/ /de'i lhan cig gnas pa dgra bcom pa
170b6('dul ba): zhig gis bdag gi mkhan po gang du skyes zhes sems par zhugs nas/ des lha rnams kyi nang du rnam par blta par brtsams nas/ ma mthong zhing / mi dang / dud 'gro dang / yi dwags rnams kyi
170b7('dul ba): nang du rnam par bltas na/ der yang ma mthong ngo / /sems can dmyal pa'i nang du rnam par blta par brtsams na/ sems can dmyal pa chen po mnar med par skyes par mthong nas/ des bsams pa
171a1('dul ba): mkhan po ni tshul khrims dang ldan pa mang du thos pa/ chos kyi 'khor sdud sdud pa yin na/ des las ci zhig byas na/ des sems can dmyal ba chen po mnar med par skyes snyam nas bsams na/
171a2('dul ba): ma bsad pa yin par mthong ngo / /de mnar med pa'i 'od zer dag gis phog pa dang / smras pa/ kye ma bsro khang 'di me re tsha zhes smras pa dang / sems can dmyal ba'i srung mas tho ba blangs te/ mgor
171a3('dul ba): bsnun nas/ skal chad khyod kyi bsro khang ga la yod/ 'di ltar 'di ni sems can dmyal ba chen po mnar med pa yin no zhes smras so/ /de dge ba'i sems kyis dus la bab nas/ rgyal chen bzhi'i
171a4('dul ba): ris kyi lha rnams kyi nang du skyes so/ /lha'i bu'am lha'i bu mo'i chos nyid ni skyes nas ring po ma lon pa la sems gsum skye ste/ gang nas shi 'phos pa dang / gang du skyes pa dang / las gang gis skyes
171a5('dul ba): pa'o/ /des sems can dmyal ba rnams kyi nang nas shi 'phos ba dang / rgyal chen bzhi'i ris kyi lha rnams kyi nang du skyes pa dang / dge 'dun la bsro khang gi khrus byas pas skyes pa mthong ngo / /de
171a6('dul ba): nas sngon sems can dmyal ba lha'i bu de 'di snyam du sems te/ gang gi phyir bdag zhag lon par gnas te/ bcom ldan 'das la blta ba dang / bsnyen bkur bya ba'i phyir nye bar 'gro ba ni/ bdag
171a7('dul ba): gi tshul dang mthun pa ma yin gyis/ bdag zhag lon par ma gnas pa kho nar bcom ldan 'das la blta ba dang / bsnyen bkur bya ba'i phyir nye bar 'gro'o snyam mo/ /de nas sngon sems can dmyal ba lha'i bu
171b1('dul ba): rna cha gdub bgor g.yo zhing dri ma med par thogs te/ do shal dang se mo dos brgyan pa'i lus kyis/ lha'i ud pa la dang / pad+ma dang / ku mu da dang / pad+ma dkar po dag gis thu ba bkang ste/ kha dog shin
171b2('dul ba): tu 'das pas mtshan mo la bab pa dang / bcom ldan 'das ga la ba der song ste phyin nas/ bcom ldan 'das la me tog dag gis mngon par gtor te/ bcom ldan 'das kyi zhabs gnyis la mgo
171b3('dul ba): ngos phyag 'tshal nas/ mtha' gcig tu 'dug pa dang / 'di ltar sngon sems can dmyal ba lha'i bu'i kha dog gi mthus/ rgyal byed kyi tshal thams cad snang ba rgya chen pos khyab par gyur to/ /de nas
171b4('dul ba): bcom ldan 'das kyis sngon sems can dmyal ba lha'i bu'i bsam pa dang / bag la nyal pa dang / khams dang rang bzhin thugs su chud nas/ gang thos nas sems can dmyal ba lha'i bus stan de
171b5('dul ba): nyid la 'dug bzhin du 'jig tshogs la lta ba'i ri'i rtse mo nyi shu mtho ba/ ye shes kyi rdo rjes bcom ste/ rgyun du zhugs pa'i 'bras bu mngon sum du byas pa de lta bur 'phags pa'i bden pa bzhi yang
171b6('dul ba): dag par so sor rtog par byad pa'i chos bstan par mdzad do/ /des bden pa mthong nas/ btsun pa bcom ldan 'das kyis bdag la gang mdzad pa 'di lta bu ni/ bdag la las kyang ma bgyis/
171b7('dul ba): mas kyang ma bgyis/ rgyal pos kyang ma bgyis/ lha rnams kyis kyang ma bgyis/ sngon gyi pha mes dag gis kyang ma bgyis/ dge sbyong dang bram ze dag gis kyang ma bgyis/ byams pa dang mdza' bshes
172a1('dul ba): dang / rtsa lag gi tshogs kyis kyang ma bgyis te/ khrag dang mchi ma'i rgya mtsho ni bskams/ rus pa'i ri dag las ni bsgral/ ngan song gi sgo dag ni bkum/ mtho
172a2('dul ba): ris dang thar pa'i sgo dag ni phye/ sems can dmyal ba dang / dud 'gro dang / yi dwags dag nas ni rkang pa phyung / lha dang mi rnams kyi nang du bzhag go zhes lan gsum ched du brjod pa ched du brjod
172a3('dul ba): do| |yang smras pa/ khyod mthus rab drag nyes pa mang ldan pa'i/ /ngan song shul bkag bsod nams rab ldan pa'i/ /mtho ris 'gro ba phye zhing bdag gis ni/ /mya ngan 'das pa'i shul ni thob
172a4('dul ba): par gyur/ /shin tu rnam dag khyod brten bdag gis ni/ /de ring skyon bral dag pa'i mig thob cing / /go 'phang zhi ba 'phags pa dgyes thob ste/ /sdug bsngal rgya mtsho pha rol rgal bar gyur/ /'gro
172a5('dul ba): ba lha min mi dang lhas mchod pa/ /skye dang rga dang na 'chi bral ba po/ /srid pa stong du mthong bar rab dkon pa/ /thub pa de ring khyod mthong 'bras bu mchis/ /de nas 'dud byas do shal rab 'phyang bas//
172a6('dul ba): zhabs la phyag 'tshal rangs pa skyes gyur nas/ /dgra thul g.yas nas yongs su bskor byas te/ /lha yi 'jig rten mngon phyogs mkha' la song / /de nas sngon sems can dmyal ba lha'i bu
172a7('dul ba): tshong pa khe spogs rnyed pa lta bu dang / zhing pa lo tog 'byor pa lta bu dang / dpa' bo g.yul las rnam par rgyal ba lta bu dang / nad pa nad thams cad las yongs su thar ba lta bur gyur te/ cha lugs
172b1('dul ba): gang gis bcom ldan 'das kyi spyan sngar 'ongs pa'i cha lugs de nyid kyis rang gi gnas su song ngo / /de'i lhan cig gnas pa dge 'dun gyi gnas brtan dgra bcom pa zas kyi gral du 'dug ste/ de
172b2('dul ba): lhan cig gnas pa gzhan zhig dge 'dun la chu 'brim par byed do/ /ji tsam na dge 'dun gyi gnas brtan des chu kha phor du blangs nas/ sor mo'i rtse mor reg na shin tu grang nas/ des bsams pa/ bdag
172b3('dul ba): cag ni chu shin tu grang mo 'di lta bu 'thung na/ mkhan po ni sems can dmyal ba chen po mnar med pa na/ zangs khu bskol ba 'thung ngo snyam nas/ des sems can dmyal ba chen po mnar med par rnam
172b4('dul ba): par blta ba brtsams na/ mi snang ngo / |dud 'gro dang / yi dwags dang / mi dang sems can dmyal ba gzhan rnams su yang rnam par bltas na/ de rnams na yang mi snang nas lha rnams kyi bar gyi
172b5('dul ba): nang du rnam par blta bar brtsams na/ rgyal chen bzhi'i lha rnams kyi nang du skyes te/ lhar gyur pas/ bcom ldan 'das kyi spyan sngar bden pa mthong bar byas te/ lha rnams kyi nang na 'dug pa mthong
172b6('dul ba): nas/ 'dzum pa sngon du btang ste/ bcom ldan 'das la dad pa thob nas/ kye ma sangs rgyas/ kye ma chos/ kye ma dge 'dun/ kye ma chos kyi legs par gsungs pa nyid/ 'di ltar sdig pa byed
172b7('dul ba): pa log par ltung bar song ba de lta bu dag gis kyang / yon tan gyi tshogs 'di lta bu thob bo zhes ched du brjod pa ched du brjod do/ /mkhan po gcig pa des de rangs shing mgu ba dang / mchog tu dga'
173a1('dul ba): bar mthong nas smras pa/ tshe dang ldan pa khyod mkhan po dus la bab pas/ bdag dge 'dun gyi gnas brtan du gyur to snyam nas rangs shing mgu ba dang mchog tu dga'
173a2('dul ba): bar gyur tam/ des smras pa/ tshe dang ldan pa re zhig khyod kyis dri ba'i lan gdab pa'i dus ma yin gyis/ dge 'dun gyi nang du dris shig dang / der khyod kyis dri ba'i lan gdab pa'i dus la bab
173a3('dul ba): par 'gyur ro/ /ji tsam dus gzhan zhig na/ dge slong gi dge 'dun tshogs shing 'khod pa na/ dge 'dun gyi gnas brtan gyi mkhan po gcig pa de la dris pa/ tshe dang ldan pa khyod kyis de'i tshe
173a4('dul ba): ci smras/ des smras pa/ khyod la kho bos mkhan po dus la bab pas bdag dge 'dun gyi gnas brtan du gyur to snyam nas/ rangs shing mgu ba dang / mchog tu dga' bar gyur tam zhes smras so//
173a5('dul ba): des skabs de dge 'dun gyi nang du de la rgya cher brjod pa dang / de yang yid rangs shing dge slong rnams kyang / kye ma sangs rgyas/ kye ma chos/ kye ma dge 'dun/ kye ma chos kyi legs par gsungs
173a6('dul ba): pa nyid/ 'di ltar sdig pa byed pa log pa ltung bar song ba de lta bu dag gis kyang / yon tan gyi tshogs de lta bu thob bo zhes ched du brjod pa ched du brjod do// //'dul ba gzhi/
173a7('dul ba): bam po bcu gcig pa/ sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das mnyan yod na/ rgyal byed kyi tshal mgon med zas sbyin gyi kun dga' ra ba na bzhugs so/ /mnyan yod na khyim bdag gcig 'dug pa
173b1('dul ba): des/ rigs mnyam pa las chung ma blangs nas/ de de dang lhan cig rtse bar byed/ dga' bar byed/ dga' mgur spyod par byed do/ /rtse bar byed/ dga' bar byed/ dga' mgur spyod par byed pa de'i
173b2('dul ba): bu byung nas/ de dus gzhan zhig na/ ne'u ldangs dang lhan cig khyim zhig gi drung du song ba na/ khyim de'i steng na bu mo zhig 'dug pa des de'i steng du me tog gi chun po 'phangs pa dang / des bu mo de
173b3('dul ba): mthong ngo / /ne'u ldangs kyis smras pa/ grogs po khyod kyis khyim der brda byas sam/ des smras pa/ de yin te kho bos brda byas so/ /des smras pa/ grogs po khyim 'di ni yang ba yin gyis/ ma
173b4('dul ba): 'jug cig / tshul ma yin pas sdug bsngal bar gyur ta re zhes/ des nyin thog thag tu 'phyan du bcug ste/ pha'i gan du khrid nas smras pa/ yab khyod kyi bu 'dis khyim che ge zhig tu brda byas pa/ kho
173b5('dul ba): bos nyin thog thag tu bsrungs kyis/ da khyod kyis mtshan mo srungs shig /khyim de ni ya nga ba yin gyis 'jug tu ma gzhug cig /tshul ma yin pas sdug bsngal bar gyur ta re/ des smras pa/ bu
173b6('dul ba): khyod kyis kho bo la bsnyad pa khyod kyis legs pa byas so/ /des khye'u de khyim gyi nang du mal bcas te/ gyo mo gnyis dang chu dang sa dag bzhag nas khyim der bcug ste/ bdag nyid sgor khri bcas nas
173b7('dul ba): nyal lo/ /des smras pa/ yab sgo phye shig/ bu ci'i phyir/ gcir 'gro'o/ /des smras pa/ bu 'di nyid du kho bos gyo mo bzhag gis der gcis shig /des yud tsam zhig bsdad de smras pa/ yab
174a1('dul ba): sgo phye shig / bu ci'i phyir bshang du 'gro'o/ /des smras pa/ bu 'di nyid du kho bos gyo mo dang chu dang sa bzhag gis 'di nyid du bshang ba phyogs shig /des yang yud tsam
174a2('dul ba): zhig bsdad de smras pa/ yab sgo phye shig /des smras pa/ bu khyod gang du 'gro 'dod pa kho bos mi shes sam ci/ kho bo sgo dbye bar mi nus so/ /yab kho bos khyod gsad do/ /des smras pa/ bu kho bo shi
174a3('dul ba): ba ni bla'i/ kho bo bu shi ba la lta ni mi phod do/ /'dod pa brten pas ni sdig pa mi bya ba ci yang med pas/ snying rje med pa'i sems dang ldan pa 'jig rten pha rol btang ba des/ ral gri shugs
174a4('dul ba): nas phyung ste/ de'i mgo drungs nas bcad nas de sa la bsgyel to/ /des pha bsad nas song ba dang / sems can sdig pa'i las byas pa 'dar bas/ bu mo des de la smras pa/ rje'i sras
174a5('dul ba): 'di na su yang ma mchis te/ bdag bu mo dang gnyis su bas kyis ma bsnyengs shig /des bsams pa/ des 'di la smras na dga' bar 'gyur ro snyam nas/ des smras pa/ bzang mo
174a6('dul ba): kho bos khyod kyi phyir pha bsad do/ /des smras pa/ ci pha pa'am/ 'on te skyed pha/ des smras pa/ skyed pha'o/ /des bsams pa/ 'di yon tan dag mngon par mi shes te/ pha gsod
174a7('dul ba): par byed pas/ gang gi tshe bdag la khro ba skyes na/ bdag la gnas skabs ci zhig 'byung bar 'gyur snyam nas/ des smras pa/ rje'i sras bdag steng gi khang thog tu 'dzegs nas
174b1('dul ba): slar mchi'i bar du re zhig bzhes shig / des smras pa/ de bzhin gyis shig /de nas de steng gi khang thog tu 'dzegs nas/ chom rkun pa chom rkun pa zhes sgra phyung ba dang / de 'jigs shing skrag nas
174b2('dul ba): bros te rang gi khyim du song nas/ sgo drung du ral gri bzhag ste/ chom rkun pa de ni 'di yin te/ kho bo'i pha bsad nas bros so zhes sgra phyung nas/ des pha'i ro de bkur sti byas te song ngo / /sems can sdig pa'i
174b3('dul ba): las byas pas ni/ brtan pa mi rnyed pas/ de mu stegs can gyi gnas dang / dka' thub kyi nags de dang de dag tu song ste dris pa/ shes ldan dag las ci zhig byas na des sdig pa'i las zad par 'gyur/ de
174b4('dul ba): na kha cig na re mer zhugs shig ces zer ro/ /kha cig na re dug zo zhig ces zer ro/ /kha cig na re g.yang sar mchongs shig ces zer ro/ /kha cig na re chur mchongs shig ces zer ro/ /kha cig na re thag pas
174b5('dul ba): 'gags te shi zhig ces zer te/ thams cad kyang shi ba'i thabs ston par byed kyis/ nges par 'byung ba'i thabs ston pa ni 'ga' yang med do/ /de dus gzhan zhig na rgyal byed kyi tshal du song ba dang / des de na
174b6('dul ba): dge slong zhig / gang gis sdig pa'i las byas pa/ /dge ba yis ni 'gog byed de/ /nyi zla sprin nas byung ba ltar/ /'jig rten 'dir ni der snang 'gyur/ /zhes kha ton zer ba thos nas/ des bsams pa/ sdig
174b7('dul ba): pa'i las kyang dgag par nus kyis/ 'di dag gi nang du rab tu 'byung bar bya'o snyam nas/ de dge slong gi gan du song nas smras pa/ 'phags pa bdag rab tu 'byung bar 'tshal la/ /des de rab tu phyung
175a1('dul ba): zhing bsnyen par rdzogs par byas nas/ des shin tu brtson 'grus brtsams te/ bklag par brtsams so/ /des klog cing kha ton byed pa na/ sde snod gsum bklags
175a2('dul ba): shing / sde snod gsum dang ldan pa/ rig pa dang grol ba'i spobs pa can du gyur to/ /de la dge slong dag gis smras pa/ tshe dang ldan pa khyod brtson 'grus 'dis ci zhig don du gnyer/ des smras pa/
175a3('dul ba): sdig pa'i las zad par bya'o/ /khyod kyis sdig pa'i las ci zhig byas/ pha bsad do/ /ci pha pa'am/ 'on te skyed pha yin/ des smras pa/ skyed pha yin no zhes zer ba'i skabs de bcom ldan 'das la dge
175a4('dul ba): slong rnams kyis gsol pa dang / de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis dge slong rnams la bka' stsal pa/ dge slong dag 'di ni gang zag pha bsad pa bsnyil bar 'os pa yin te/ dge slong dag gang zag pha
175a5('dul ba): bsad pa ni chos 'dul ba 'di la mi skye ba'i chos can yin pas/ dge slong dag khyod kyis gang zag pha bsad pa chos 'dul ba 'di las bsnyil bar bya'o/ /'ga' zhig gi gan du rab tu 'byung bar
175a6('dul ba): 'dod pa 'ongs na/ des de la pha bsad pa ma yin nam zhes dri bar bya'o/ /ma dris par rab tu 'byin par byed na 'gal tshabs can du 'gyur ro/ /des bsams pa/ ci da 'bab par bya'am/ mtha'
175a7('dul ba): 'khob cig tu 'gro ba bya snyam nas/ des mtha' 'khob tu song ste/ khyim bdag gcig rjes su 'jug par byas so/ /des mngon par dad pas de'i phyir gtsug lag khang brtsig tu bcug ste/ der phyogs
175b1('dul ba): dang yul tha dad pa na 'khod pa'i dge slong dag gnas shing / de'i gdams ngag gis mang po dag gis dgra bcom pa nyid mngon du byas so/ /de dus gzhan zhig na na bar gyur nas/ rtsa ba dang / sdong bu dang /
175b2('dul ba): lo ma dang / me tog dang / 'bras bu'i sman dag gis rim gro byas na/ nyam dmas pa nyid du gyur nas/ des lhan cig gnas pa rnams la smras pa/ tshe dang ldan pa dag kho bo'i phyir dge 'dun la bsro
175b3('dul ba): khang gyis shig / de rnams kyis de'i phyir bsro khang byas so/ /bsags pa kun gyi mtha' zad cing / /mthon po rnams kyi mtha' ltung 'gyur/ /phrad pa'i mtha' ni 'bral ba ste/ /gson pa'i mtha' ni 'chi ba
175b4('dul ba): yin/ /zhes bya ba yin pas/ de shi zhing dus la bab nas sems can dmyal ba chen po mnar med par skyes so/ /de'i lhan cig gnas pa dgra bcom pa zhig gis bdag gi mkhan po gang du skyes zhes
175b5('dul ba): sems pa la zhugs nas/ des lha rnams kyi nang du rnam par blta bar brtsams na/ ma mthong zhing / mi dang dud 'gro dang / yi dwags rnams kyi nang du rnam par bltas na der yang ma mthong ngo / /sems
175b6('dul ba): can dmyal ba'i nang du rnam par blta bar brtsams na/ sems can dmyal ba chen po mnar med par skyes par mthong nas/ des bsams pa/ mkhan po ni tshul khrims dang ldan pa/ mang du thos pa/
175b7('dul ba): chos kyi 'khor sdud sdud pa yin na/ des las ci zhig byas na/ des sems can dmyal ba chen po mnar med par skyes snyam nas/ des bsams pa na/ pha bsad pa yin par mthong ngo / /de mnar med
176a1('dul ba): pa'i 'od zer dag gis phog pa dang / smras pa/ kye ma bsro khang 'di me re tsha zhes smras pa dang / sems can dmyal ba'i srung mas tho ba blangs te mgor bsnun nas/
176a2('dul ba): skal chad khyod la bsro khang ga la yod/ 'di ltar 'di ni sems can dmyal ba chen po mnar med pa yin no zhes smras so/ /de dge ba'i sems kyis dus byas nas/ rgyal chen bzhi'i ris kyi lha rnams kyi
176a3('dul ba): nang du skyes so/ /lha'i bu dang lha'i bu mo'i chos nyid ni skyes nas ring po ma lon pa la sems gsum skye ste/ gang nas shi 'phos pa dang / gang du skyes pa dang / las gang gis skyes pa'o/ /des sems can
176a4('dul ba): dmyal ba rnams kyi nang nas shi 'phos pa dang / rgyal chen bzhi'i ris kyi lha rnams kyi nang du skyes pa dang / dge 'dun la bsro khang gi khrus byas pas skyes pa mthong ngo / /de nas sngon sems can
176a5('dul ba): dmyal ba lha'i bu de 'di snyam du sems te/ gang gi phyir bdag zhag lon par gnas te/ bcom ldan 'das la blta ba dang / bsnyen bkur bya ba'i phyir nye bar 'gro ba ni bdag gis tshul dang mthun pa ma
176a6('dul ba): yin gyis/ bdag zhag lon par ma gnas pa kho nar/ bcom ldan 'das la blta ba dang / bsnyen bkur bya ba'i phyir nye bar 'gro'o snyam mo/ /de nas sngon sems can dmyal ba lha'i bu rna cha gdub kor
176a7('dul ba): g.yo zhing / dri ma med pa thogs te/ do shal dang / se mo dos brgyan pa'i lus kyis/ lha'i ud pa la dang / pad+ma dang / ku mud pa dang / pad+ma dkar po dag gis thu ba bkang ste/ kha dog shin tu 'das
176b1('dul ba): pas mtshan mo la bab pa dang / bcom ldan 'das ga la ba der song ste phyin nas/ bcom ldan 'das la me tog gis mngon par gtor te/ bcom ldan 'das kyi zhabs gnyis la mgo bos phyag
176b2('dul ba): 'tshal nas/ mtha' gcig tu 'dug pa dang / 'di ltar sngon sems can dmyal ba lha'i bu'i kha dog gi mthus rgyal byed kyi tshal thams cad snang ba rgya chen pos khyab par gyur to/ /de nas bcom ldan
176b3('dul ba): 'das kyis sngon sems can dmyal ba pa lha'i bu'i bsams pa dang / bag la nyal dang / khams dang / rang bzhin thugs su chud nas/ gang thos nas sngon sems can dmyal ba lha'i bus stan de
176b4('dul ba): nyid la 'dug bzhin du/ 'jig tshogs la lta ba ri'i rtse mo nyi shu mtho ba ye shes kyi rdo rjes bcom ste/ rgyun du zhugs pa'i 'bras bu mngon sum du byas pa de ltar 'phags pa'i bden pa bzhi yang dag
176b5('dul ba): par so sor rtogs par byed pa'i chos bstan pa mdzad do/ /des bden pa mthong nas/ btsun pa bcom ldan 'das kyis bdag la gang mdzad pa 'di lta bu ni/ bdag la phas kyang ma bgyis/ mas kyang
176b6('dul ba): ma bgyis/ rgyal pos kyang ma bgyis/ lha rnams kyis kyang ma bgyis/ sngon gyi pha mes dag gis kyang ma bgyis/ dge sbyong dang bram ze dag gis kyang ma bgyis/ byams pa dang mdza' bshes dang / rtsa
176b7('dul ba): lag gi tshogs kyis kyang ma bgyis te/ khrag dang mchi ma'i rgya mtsho ni bskams/ rus pa'i ri dag las ni bsgral/ ngan song gi sgo dag ni bkum/ mtho ris dang thar pa'i sgo dag ni phye/ sems can dmyal
177a1('dul ba): ba dang / dud 'gro dang / yi dwags dag nas ni rkang pa phyung / lha dang mi rnams kyi nang du ni bzhag go zhes lan gsum ched du brjod pa ched du brjod do/ /yang smras pa/ khyod mthus rab drag nyes
177a2('dul ba): pa mang ldan pa'i/ /ngan song shul bkag bsod nams rab ldan pa'i/ /mtho ris 'gro ba phye zhing bdag gis ni/ /mya ngan 'das pa'i shul yang thob par gyur/ /shin tu rnam dag khyod brten bdag
177a3('dul ba): gis ni/ /de ring skyon bral dag pa'i mig thob cing / /go 'phang zhi ba 'phags pa dgyes thob ste/ /sdug bsngal rgya mtsho'i pha rol rgal bar gyur/ /'gro ba lha min mi dang lhas mchod pa/ /skye dang rga
177a4('dul ba): dang na 'chi bral ba po/ /srid pa stong du mthong bar rab dkon pa/ /thub pa de ring khyod mthong 'bras bu mchis/ /de nas 'dud byas do shal rab 'phyang bas/ /zhabs la phyag 'tshal rangs pa skyes gyur nas/
177a5('dul ba): dgra thul g.yas nas yongs su bskor byas te/ /lha yi 'jig rten mngon phyogs mkha' la song / /de nas sngon sems can dmyal ba lha'i bu tshong pa khe spogs rnyed pa lta bu dang / zhing pa lo tog 'byor ba lta
177a6('dul ba): bu dang / dpa' bo g.yul las rnam par rgyal ba lta bu dang / nad pa nad thams cad las yongs su thar ba lta bur gyur te/ cha lugs gang gis bcom ldan 'das kyi spyan sngar 'ongs pa'i cha lugs de
177a7('dul ba): nyid kyis rang gi gnas su song ngo / /de'i lhan cig gnas pa dge 'dun gyi gnas brtan dgra bcom pa zas kyi gral du 'dug ste/ de'i lhan cig gnas pa gzhan zhig dge 'dun la chu 'brim par
177b1('dul ba): byad do/ /ji tsam na dge 'dun gyi gnas brtan des chu khar phor du blugs te/ sor mo'i rtse mos reg na/ shin tu grang nas des bsams pa/ bdag cag ni chu shin tu grang mo 'di lta bu 'thung na/
177b2('dul ba): mkhan po ni sems can dmyal ba chen po mnar med pa na zangs khu bskol ba 'thung ngo snyam nas/ des sems can dmyal ba chen po mnar med par rnam par blta bar brtsams na mi snang ngo / /dud
177b3('dul ba): 'gro dang / yi dwags dang / mi dang / sems can dmyal ba gzhan rnams su yang rnam par bltas na/ de rnams na yang mi snang nas lha rnams kyi nang du rnam par blta bar brtsams na/ rgyal chen
177b4('dul ba): bzhi'i ris kyi lha rnams kyi nang du skyes te/ lhar gyur pas bcom ldan 'das kyi spyan sngar bden pa mthong bar byas te/ lha rnams kyi nang na 'dug par mthong nas/ 'dzum pa sngon du btang ste/ bcom ldan
177b5('dul ba): 'das la dad pa thob nas/ kye ma sangs rgyas/ kye ma chos/ kye ma dge 'dun/ kye ma chos kyi legs par gsungs pa nyid/ 'di ltar sdig pa byed pa log par ltung bar song ba de lta bu dag gis kyang
177b6('dul ba): yon tan gyi tshogs 'di lta bu thob bo zhes ched du brjod pa ched du brjod do/ /mkhan po gcig pa des de rangs shing mgu ba dang / mchog tu dga' bar mthong nas smras pa/ tshe dang ldan pa khyod mkhan po
177b7('dul ba): dus la bab pas bdag ni dge 'dun gyi gnas brtan du gyur to snyam nas/ rangs shing mgu pa dang mchog tu dga' bar gyur tam/ des smras pa/ tshe dang ldan pa re zhig khyod kyi dri ba'i lan gdab pa'i
178a1('dul ba): dus ma yin gyis/ dge 'dun gyi nang du dris shig dang / der khyod kyi dri ba'i lan gdab pa'i dus la bab par 'gyur ro/ /ji tsam dus gzhan zhig na dge slong gi dge 'dun
178a2('dul ba): tshogs shing 'khod pa na/ dge 'dun gyi gnas brtan gyis mkhan po gcig pa de la dris pa/ tshe dang ldan pa khyod kyis de'i tshe ci smras/ des smras pa/ khyod la kho bos khyod mkhan po dus la bab
178a3('dul ba): pas/ bdag dge 'dun gyi gnas brtan du gyur to snyam nas/ rangs shing mgu ba dang mchog tu dga' bar gyur tam zhes smras so/ /des skabs de dge 'dun gyi nang du de la rgya cher brjod pa dang / de
178a4('dul ba): yang yi rangs shing dge slong rnams kyang kye ma sangs rgyas/ kye ma chos/ kye ma dge 'dun/ kye ma chos kyi legs par gsungs pa nyid/ 'di ltar sdig pa byed pa/ log par ltung bar song
178a5('dul ba): ba de lta bu dag gis kyang yon tan gyi tshogs de lta bu thob bo zhes ched du brjod pa ched du brjod do/ /sdom la/ dgra bcom gsad dang dge 'dun dbyen/ /ngan sems kyis ni khrag phyung dang / /pham
178a6('dul ba): par 'gyur ba bzhi po dang / /gnas nas dbyung ba gsum yin no/ /sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das mnyan yod na rgyal byed kyi tshal mgon med zas sbyin gyi kun dga' ra ba na bzhugs so/ /gang gi tshe bcom
178a7('dul ba): ldan 'das kyis ltang brang gi tshal gseb tu ma ga d+ha'i rgyal po bzo sbyangs gzugs can snying po la lha brgyad khri dang / ma ga d+ha'i bram ze dang khyim bdag 'bum phrag du ma dag dang lhan cig bden pa
178b1('dul ba): dag la bkod pa na/ des rang gi yul du dril bsgrags pa byed du bcug ste/ nga'i yul du sus kyang chom rkun mi bya'o/ /gang zhig byed pan ngas de yul med par bya zhing / skyin pa ni nga nyid kyi mdzod dang bang
178b2('dul ba): ba nas sbyin par bya'o zhes bsgo'o/ /gang gi tshe bcom ldan 'das kyis ko sa'i rgyal po gsal rgyal gzhon nu'i dpe'i mdo sdes btul ba de'i tshe na/ des kyang dril bsgrags pa byed du bcug ste/ nga'i yul du
178b3('dul ba): sus kyang chom rkun mi bya'o/ /gang zhig byed na de gsad pa'i gyod la bskrin cing skyin pa ni nga nyid kyi mdzod dang bang ba nas sbyin par bya'o zhes bsgo ba dang / de nas yul ma ga d+ha'i chom rkun pa dag gang yin pa dang /
178b4('dul ba): yul ko sa la'i chom rkun pa dag gang yin pa de dag sa mtshams kyi bar du dong ste 'khod nas yul ma ga d+ha nas don mthun 'ong ba gang yin pa de yang 'joms par byed do/ /yul ko sa la nas don mthun 'ong
178b5('dul ba): ba gang yin pa de yang 'joms par byed do/ /ji tsam dus gzhan zhig na don mthun pa bsel pa dang bcas pa yul ma ga d+ha nas yul ko sa lar 'phags pa dang / gang gi tshe sa mtshams kyi bar du phyin pa de'i
178b6('dul ba): tshe ded dpon des smras pa/ shes ldan dag rgyal po gsal rgyal de ni gdug pa pha rol gnon pa yin pas bdag cag la skyin pa sbyin du 'jug nus pa yin na/ bdag cag gis ci'i phyir bsel ba la gla
178b7('dul ba): sbyin par bya/ 'di dag 'di nyid nas phyir bzlog go zhes de dag phyir bzlog ste/ don mthun de tshogs nyung ngur chas pa dang / chom rkun pa de dag gis kyang bya ma rta btsugs te bsdad pa dang / des de mthong
179a1('dul ba): nas shes ldan dag don mthun tshogs nyung dus 'ongs na/ ci'i phyir btang snyoms su 'khod ces smras pa dang / de nas chom rkun pa de dag gis der tshong pa kha cig ni
179a2('dul ba): srog dang phral lo/ kha cig ni zong bor te bros so/ /dgra bcom pa dag ni ma bsams par shes pa dang mthong ba mi 'jug pas/ dgra bcom pa don mthun pa de dang 'gro ba zhig kyang srog dang phral
179a3('dul ba): lo| |de na don mthun gang dag bros pa de dag mgo dang lus rdul gyis yogs te/ klad pa'i skra yogs nas/ ku co 'don cing ko sa la'i rgyal po gsal rgyal gyi drung du phyin nas/ thal mo sbyar te smras
179a4('dul ba): pa| lha khyod kyi yul du bdag cag tshong par mi rung bar rnam par bzhag go / ci zhig byas/ bdag cag chom rkun pa dag gis bcom mo/ /phyogs gang du che ge me zhig tu'o/ /rgyal pos dmag dpon
179a5('dul ba): 'phags skyes po la bsgo ba/ rkun rdzas dang chom rkun pa dag myur du khug cig /des dpung gi tshogs yan lag bzhi pa go bskon nas phyir byung ba dang / chom rkun pa de dag kyang go cha phud nas bag yangs su
179a6('dul ba): sA la'i dgon pa zhig na rkun rdzas bgod cing 'khod pa las/ dmag dpon 'phags skyes pos de dag phyogs bzhir bskor nas/ dbus su dung dang rnga pa Ta ha'i sgra dag gis skrag par byas pa dang / de
179a7('dul ba): rnams las kha cig ni rkun rdzas bor te bros so/ /kha cig ni bsad do/ /drug cu ni gson por bzung ste/ des rkun rdzas de yang khyer nas rgyal po'i drung du song ste smras pa/ lha chom rkun pa dag ni 'di
179b1('dul ba): dag lags so/ /rkun rdzas ni 'di dag lags so/ /de nas rgyal pos de rnams la smras pa/ shes ldan dag khyod kyis rgyal pos dril bsgrags pa byed du bcug ste/ nga'i yul du sus kyang chom rkun mi bya'o/ /gang
179b2('dul ba): zhig byed na de gsad pa'i gyod la bskrin cing skyin pa ni nga nyid kyi mdzod dang bang ba nas sbyin no zhes ma thos sam/ de dag gis smras pa/ lha thos so/ /'on ci'i phyir tshong pa dag bcom/ lha 'tsho ba ma mchis
179b3('dul ba): so| |ci'i phyir srog dang bral| 'jigs pa nye bar bstan pa'i slad du'o/ /khyod kyis 'jigs pa de 'dra ba nya bar bstan pa dang / da sngon sus kyang ma mthong ba gang yin pa'i 'jigs pa de 'dra ba nye bar
179b4('dul ba): bstan par bya'o/ /de nas rgyal pos blon po rnams la bsgo ba/ shes ldan dag deng la 'di dag thams cad gsod cig /de dag gis lam po che dang srang dang lam gyi bzhi mdo dang sum mdo rnams su rjes
179b5('dul ba): su sgrogs shing gsad par khrid pa na/ chom rkun pa zhig lam ldog par bros te rgyal byed kyi tshal du dge slong gi gan du song ste smras pa/ 'phags pa bdag rab tu 'byung bar 'tshal lo/ /des rab
179b6('dul ba): tu phyung zhing bsnyen par rdzogs par byas so/ /chom rkun pa de dag kyang bsad do/ /bcom ldan 'das kyis dge slong dag rang gi rgud pa dang / gzhan gyi rgud pa dang / rang gi 'byor pa dang / gzhan
179b7('dul ba): gyi 'byor pa la yang dang yang du so sor rtogs shig / de ci'i phyir zhe na/ dge slong dag rang gi rgud pa dang / gzhan gyi rgud pa ni kun tu skyo bar 'gyur ba'i gnas yin la/ rang gi 'byor pa
180a1('dul ba): dang / gzhan gyi 'byor pa yang kun tu skyo bar 'gyur ba'i gnas yin pa'i phyir ro/ /zhes gsungs pas/ ji tsam dus gzhan zhig na dge slong rnams
180a2('dul ba): dur khrod rgyur 'dod pa na/ dge slong de yang de rnams dang lhan cig tu dur khrod rgyur song ba las/ des chom rkun pa de dag bsad pa mthong nas/ mchi mas brnangs te 'dug par gyur
180a3('dul ba): pa dang / dge slong rnams kyis smras pa/ tshe dang ldan pa dag gsar bu rab tu byung ba yin yang bsams pa 'di 'dra bar bzang ngo / /des skad phyung ste ngu bar brtsams pa dang / dge slong
180a4('dul ba): rnams kyis smras pa/ tshe dang ldan pa khyod ci'i phyir cho nges 'debs/ des smras pa/ 'di ni bdag gi pha'o/ /'di ni bdag cag gi phu nu'o/ /'di ni bdag cag gi kho bo'o/ /'di ni zhang po'o/ /de
180a5('dul ba): rnams kyis smras pa/ 'di rnams kyis dgra bcom pa srog dang phral na/ khyod kyis kyang dgra bcom pa srog dang phral lam/ nges smras pa/ phral lo zhes zer ba'i skabs de/ bcom ldan
180a6('dul ba): 'das la dge slong rnams kyis gsol pa dang / bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ dge slong dag gang zag 'di ni dgra bcom pa bsad pa yin te/ gang zag dgra bcom pa bsad pa ni
180a7('dul ba): chos 'dul ba 'di la mi skye ba'i chos can yin pas/ dge slong dag khyed kyis gang zag dgra bcom pa bsad pa/ chos 'dul ba 'di las bsnyil bar bya'o/ /'ga' zhig gi gan du rab tu
180b1('dul ba): 'byung bar 'dod pa 'ongs na/ des de la dgra bcom pa bsad pa ma yin nam zhes dri bar bya'o/ /ma dris par rab tu 'byin par byed/ bsnyen par rdzogs par byed na 'gal tshabs can du 'gyur
180b2('dul ba): ro| |sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das la tshe dang ldan pa nye bar 'khor gyis zhus pa/ btsun pa gang gi sngon rab tu phyung ba na/ de bzhin gshegs pa'i nyan thos kyi dge 'dun phye ba de gal te legs par gsungs
180b3('dul ba): pa'i chos 'dul ba la rab tu 'byung ba dang / bsnyen pa rdzogs pa dge slong gi dngos po 'tshal na/ rab tu dbyung bar bgyi'am/ rab tu dbyung bar mi bgyi/ nye bar 'khor rab tu dbyung bar mi bya'o/ /de lta bas na 'ga'
180b4('dul ba): zhig gi gan du rab tu 'byung bar 'dod pa 'ongs na/ des na de la dge 'dun gyi dbyen byas pa ma yin nam zhes dri bar bya'o/ /ma dris par rab tu 'byin par byed na 'gal tshabs can du 'gyur ro/ /sangs
180b5('dul ba): rgyas bcom ldan 'das la tshe dang ldan pa nye bar 'khor gyis zhus pa/ btsun pa gang gis de bzhin gshegs pa la ngan sems kyis khrag phyung ba gal te legs par gsungs pa'i chos 'dul ba la rab
180b6('dul ba): tu 'byung ba dang / bsnyen par rdzogs pa dge slong gi dngos po 'tshal na/ rab tu dbyung bar bgyi'am/ rab tu dbyung bar mi bgyi/ nye bar 'khor rab tu dbyung bar mi bya'o/ /de lta bas na 'ga' zhig
180b7('dul ba): gi gan du rab tu 'byung bar 'dod pa 'ongs na/ des de la de bzhin gshegs pa la ngan sems kyis khrag phyung ba ma yin nam zhes dri bar bya'o/ /ma dris par rab tu 'byin par byed na 'gal tshabs
181a1('dul ba): can du 'gyur ro/ /sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das la tshe dang ldan pa nye bar 'khor gyis zhus pa/ btsun pa sngon gang rab tu 'byung ba na pham par gyur pa bzhi las
181a2('dul ba): ltung ba gang yang rung ba byung ba de/ gal te legs par gsungs pa'i chos 'dul ba la rab tu 'byung ba dang / bsnyen par rdzogs pa dge slong gi dngos po 'tshal na/ rab tu dbyung bar bgyi'am/
181a3('dul ba): rab tu dbyung bar mi bgyi/ nye bar 'khor rab tu dbyung bar mi bya'o/ /de lta bas na 'ga' zhig gi gan du rab tu 'byung bar 'dod pa 'ongs na/ des de la pham par 'gyur ba bzhi las ltung ba
181a4('dul ba): gang yang rung ba byung ba ma yin nam zhes dri bar bya'o/ /ma dris par rab tu 'byin par byed na 'gal tshabs can du 'gyur ro/ /sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das mnyan yod na/ rgyal byed kyi
181a5('dul ba): tshal mgon med zas sbyin gyi kun dga' ra ba na bzhugs so/ /de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis dge slong rnams la bka' stsal pa/ dge slong dag gal te gang zag ma mthong bas gnas nas
181a6('dul ba): phyung ba babs pa zhig yang phyir 'ongs nas/ tshe dang ldan pa dag ltung ba mthong gis bdag rab tu dbyung bar gsol zhes zer na rab tu dbyung ba bya'o/ /rab tu phyung nas tshe dang ldan pa dag
181a7('dul ba): ltung ba bshags par bya'i/ bdag bsnyen par rdzogs par mdzad du gsol/ zhes zer na bsnyen par rdzogs par bya'o/ /ji ste bsnyen par rdzogs nas ltung ba ma mthong ngo zhes zer na/
181b1('dul ba): gal te dge 'dun tshogs pa yod na yang ma mthong bas gnas nas dbyung bar bya'o/ /gal te tshogs pa med la ji ste bsnyen par rdzogs na legs par bsnyen par rdzogs pa yin te/ 'di
181b2('dul ba): ltar gang zag gis legs par gsungs pa'i chos 'dul ba la rab tu 'byung ba dang / bsnyen par rdzogs pa dge slong gi dngos po rnyed par dka' ba yin pa'i phyir ro/ /ma mthong bas gnas nas phyung
181b3('dul ba): ba ji lta ba bzhin du phyir mi 'chos pas gnas nas phyung ba dang / sdig pa can gyi lta ba'i rnam pa mi gtong bas gnas nas phyung ba yang de bzhin no/ /sdom la/ lag rdum dag dang rkang rdum
181b4('dul ba): dang / /lag sor zlum por 'jas pa dang / /mchu med lus la rma mtshan can/ /rgan ches pa dang gzhon ches dang / /theng po smad 'chal zhar ba dang / /lag sor rdum rgur mi'u thung dang / /wa ba
181b5('dul ba): lkug pa 'on pa dang / /rten 'phye dang ni rkang bam dang / /bud med kyis dub khur gyis dub/ /mi gang lam gyis dub rnams dang / /ya za ma lug ta gam dang / /de lta bu yi mi rnams ni/ /drang srong chen
181b6('dul ba): pos dgag pa mdzad/ /mdzes pa rab tu dbyung ba dang / /yongs su dag pa bsnyen rdzogs par/ /rdzogs sangs rgyas kyis rab mkhyen te/ /bden pa'i mtshan gyis bka' stsal to/ /sangs rgyas bcom
181b7('dul ba): ldan 'das mnyan yod na/ rgyal byed kyi tshal mgon med zas sbyin gyi kun dga' ra ba na bzhugs so/ /drug sde dag gi kun tu spyod pa ni/ gang rab tu byung ba dang / bsnyen par rdzogs par byas pa des
182a1('dul ba): ji srid du 'di dag ni gnas ngan len kun tu spyod pa dag yin no zhes bya bar mi shes pa de srid du de dag dang lhan cig gnas par byed la/ gang gi tshe shes par gyur pa
182a2('dul ba): de'i tshe dge slong rang bzhin du gnas pa dang lhan cig gnas par byed de/ ston pa'i bka' lung gis dus gsum du 'gro ba'i phyir blta ba 'ba' zhig byed do/ /de nas de dag gis gros bya bar
182a3('dul ba): brtsams pa/ dga' bo nye dga' lhung bzed nag po can 'di dag ni btsas 'phrog pa dang 'dra ste/ bdag cag gis rab tu phyung ba rnams 'di dag gis 'phrog par byed kyis/ da ni lhung bzed nag
182a4('dul ba): po can rnams kyis dbrog par mi 'gyur ba gang yin pa de 'dra ba rab tu dbyung bar bya'o zhes gros byas so/ /ji tsam du gzhan zhig na nye dga' kun tu 'khyam pas mi lag rdum zhig mthong nas
182a5('dul ba): smras pa/ bzhin bzang ci'i phyir rab tu mi 'byung / des smras pa/ 'phags pa bdag lag pa ma tshang ba su zhig gis rab tu 'byin par bgyid/ nye dgas smras pa/ bzhin bzang bcom
182a6('dul ba): ldan 'das kyi bstan pa la thugs rjes rab tu phye ba yin gyis/ kho bos khyod rab tu dbyung bar bya'o/ /zhes des de rab tu phyung / bsnyen par rdzogs par byas so/ /de nas zhag gnyis sam
182a7('dul ba): gsum zhig kun tu spyod pa'i chos rnams bslabs nas smras pa/ bzhin bzang ri dwags kyis ri dwags mi sos/ mnyan yod rgya che la rang gi spyod yul dang / yab kyi spyod yul yin pas bsod
182b1('dul ba): snyoms rgyus la 'tsho bar gyis shig / des smras pa/ mkhan po ji ltar bsod snyoms rgyu bar bgyi/ des smras pa/ khyod kyis de tsam mi shes sam/ ngas khyod la bstan par bya'o zhes/ des de'i sham
182b2('dul ba): thabs ni srad bus bcings/ chos gos ni tshor mas gtur te bskon/ dpung pa g.yon par ni lhung bzed kyi snod bzhag /dpung ba g.yas par ni 'khar gsil btags so/ /de nas de mnyan yod na spyod
182b3('dul ba): yul du zhugs pa dang / bud med kyis brang brdungs nas smras pa/ 'phags pa sus khyod rab tu byung ba'i lag pa gnyis bcad/ des smras pa/ sring mo khyim pa nas kho bo'i lag pa chad de/ rab tu
182b4('dul ba): phyung nas chad pa ma yin no/ /sus rab tu phyung / des smras pa/ mkhan po nye dgas so/ /de rnams kyis smras pa/ gnas ngan len kun tu spyod pa de ma gtogs par gzhan su zhig 'di lta bu rab tu
182b5('dul ba): 'byin par byed ces zer ba'i skabs de bcom ldan 'das la dge slong rnams kyis gsol pa dang / bcom ldan 'das kyis dgongs pa/ nyes dmigs gang cung zad ci byung ba de ni/ dge slong dag lag
182b6('dul ba): rdum rab tu 'byin pa las gyur pa yin snyam nas bka' stsal pa/ dge slong dag de lta bas na/ dge slong gis lag rdum rab tu dbyung bar mi bya/ bsnyen par rdzogs par mi bya'o/ /rab tu 'byin
182b7('dul ba): par byed/ bsnyen par rdzogs par byed na 'gal tshabs can du 'gyur ro/ /lag rdum ji lta ba de bzhin du/ rkang rdum dang lag por zlum por 'jas pa dang / mchu med pa dang / lus la rma mtshan can
183a1('dul ba): dang | rgan ches pa de dag kyang de bzhin no/ /dge slong dag gzhon ches pa dag rab tu 'byin par byed nas/ de dag gis dge 'dun gyi gnas mal bshang gcis mi
183a2('dul ba): rung bar byed nas/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ de dag kyang rab tu dbyung bar mi bya'o/ /theng po dag rab tu 'byin par byed nas/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ de dag
183a3('dul ba): kyang rab tu dbyung bar mi bya'o/ /smad 'chal dang / zhar ba dang / lag sor rdum po dang / rgur po dang / mi'u thung dang / wa ba can dang / lkug pa dang / 'on pa dang / rten 'phye dang / rkang bam
183a4('dul ba): dag rab tu 'byin par byed nas/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ de lta bu dag kyang rab tu dbyung bar mi bya'o/ /rab tu 'byin par byed na 'gal tshabs can du 'gyur ro/ /dge slong
183a5('dul ba): dag bud med kyis dub pa dang / khur gyis dub pa dang / lam gyis dub pa dang / ya za ma lug dang / ta gam pa dag rab tu 'byin par byed nas/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ de lta bu dag
183a6('dul ba): kyang rab tu dbyung bar mi bya'o/ /rab tu 'byin par byed na 'gal tshabs can du 'gyur ro/ /bsdu bar bya ba'i skabs so/ /rab tu 'byung ba'i gzhi rdzogs so// //gso sbyong gi gzhi'i
183a7('dul ba): spyi sdom la/ mu stegs can dang ka pi na/ /gnas dang rgyal po sbyar ba mang / /sdom la/ mu stegs can dang gsol ba dang / /gnang ba dang ni 'dug pa dang / /bab col spong dang zhal ta dang / /byed
183b1('dul ba): dang dge slong gnas rnams so/ /sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rgyal po'i khab na 'od ma'i tshal ka lan da ka'i gnas na bzhugs so/ /de'i tshe na rgyal po'i khab kyi dge bsnyen rab tu mang po dag nang
183b2('dul ba): par nang par zhing bcom ldan 'das la lta ba dang / bsnyen bkur bya ba'i phyir 'gro bar brtson par gyur to/ /de nas rgyal po'i khab kyi dge bsnyen rab tu mang po dag 'di snyam du sems te/ da ltar
183b3('dul ba): bcom ldan 'das kyang nang du yang dag 'jog par mdzad la/ dge slong yid du 'thad pa rnams kyang nang du yang dag 'jog par byed pas/ bdag cag re zhig bcom ldan 'das la lta ba dang / bsnyen bkur
183b4('dul ba): bya ba'i phyir 'dong ba sngas kyis/ bdag cag gzhan mu stegs can kun tu rgyu dag gi kun dga' ra ba ga la ba der dong ngo snyam mo/ /de nas rgyal po'i khab kyi dge bsnyen rab tu mang po dag gzhan mu stegs
183b5('dul ba): can kun tu rgyu dag gi/ kun dga' ra ba ga la ba der dong ste/ phyin nas gzhan mu stegs can kun tu rgyu dag dang / lhan cig mngon du yang dag par dga' bar 'gyur ba dang / yang dag par
183b6('dul ba): mgu bar 'gyur ba'i gtam sna tshogs byas te/ mtha' gcig tu 'khod do/ /de nas mu stegs can zhig gis mu stegs can dag la 'di skad ces smras so/ /shes ldan dag bdag cag 'ba'
183b7('dul ba): zhig la 'dug pa dang bya ba dang / gso sbyong yod dam/ 'on te shAkya'i pu'i dge slong dag la yang yod/ de nas mu stegs can zhig gis mu stegs can dag la 'di skad ces smras so/ /shes ldan
184a1('dul ba): dag bdag cag 'ba' zhig la 'dug pa dang bya ba dang / gso sbyong yod kyi shAkya'i bu'i dge sbyong dag la ni med do/ /de nas rgyal po'i khab kyi dge bsnyen rab tu mang po
184a2('dul ba): dag gzhan mu stegs can kun tu rgyu dag gis smras pa la mngon par bstod par yang mi byed/ phyir zlog par yang mi byed cing / mngon par bstod par yang ma byas/ phyir zlog par yang ma byas par stan dag
184a3('dul ba): las langs nas/ bcom ldan 'das ga la ba der song ste phyin nas/ bcom ldan 'das kyi zhabs gnyis la mgo bos phyag 'tshal te/ mtha' gcig tu 'khod do/ /mtha' gcig tu 'khod
184a4('dul ba): nas/ rgyal po'i khab kyi dge bsnyen rab tu mang po dag gis gzhan mu stegs can kun tu rgyu dag dang lhan cig bar skabs su gtam ci brjod pa de thams cad bcom ldan 'das la rgyas par
184a5('dul ba): gsol nas/ 'di skad ces kyang gsol to/ /kye ma bcom ldan 'das kyis thugs brtse ba'i slad du bdag cag gi la yang mchis pa dang / bgyi ba dang / gso sbyong bca' bar gsol/ bcom
184a6('dul ba): ldan 'das kyis rgyal po'i khab kyi dge bsnyen rab tu mang po dag la cang mi gsung bas gnang ngo / /de nas rgyal po'i khab kyi dge bsnyen rab tu mang po dag gis bcom ldan 'das kyis cang mi
184a7('dul ba): gsung bar gnang ba rig nas/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa la mngon par bstod pa dang rjes su yi rang bar byas nas/ bcom ldan 'das kyi spyan snga nas dong ngo / /de nas
184b1('dul ba): bcom ldan 'das kyis dge slong rnams la bka' stsal pa/ de lta bas na dge slong rnams kyis deng phyin chad 'dug pa dang bya ba dang / gso sbyong la tron bya bar rjes su gnang ngo / /bcom ldan 'das kyis
184b2('dul ba): dge slong rnams kyis dang phyin chad 'dug pa dang bya ba dang / gso sbyong la tron bya bar rjes su gnang ngo zhes bka' stsal nas/ de dag gis 'dug pa ji lta bu yin pa dang / bya ba ji lta bu yin pa dang / gso
184b3('dul ba): sbyong ji lta bu yin pa mi shes pa'i skabs de/ bcom ldan 'das la dge slong rnams kyis gsol pa dang / bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal ba/ dge slong dag khyed tshur shog /'dug pa ni rnal 'byor
184b4('dul ba): te| lus 'di nyid rkang pa'i mthil yan chad klad pa'i skra man chad la pags pa la thug gi bar du ji ltar gnas pa dang / ji ltar byas pa bzhin du mi gtsang ba rnam pa sna tshogs kyis gang ste/ lus 'di la
184b5('dul ba): skra dang / kha spu dang / sen mo dang / so dang / rdul dang / dri ma dang / pags pa dang / sha dang / rus pa dang / rgyus pa dang / rtsa dang / mkhal ma dang / snying dang / mchin pa dang / glo ba dang / rgyu
184b6('dul ba): ma dang / gnye ma dang / pho ba dang / long ka dang / lgang pa dang / mtsher pa dang / phyi sa dang / mchi ma dang / snabs dang / zhag dang / chu ser dang / rkang dang / tshil dang / mkhris pa dang / bad
184b7('dul ba): kan dang / rnag dang / khrag dang / klad pa dang / klad rgyas dang / gcin dag kyang yod do snyam du so sor rtogs shig /bcom ldan 'das kyis rnal 'byor bsgom par bya'o zhes bka' stsal nas/
185a1('dul ba): dge slong dag spyod yul du zhugs pa na yang rnal 'byor sgom par byed pa dang / de dag glang po che 'khrul pa dang / rta 'khrul pa dang / rkang thang pa 'khrul pa dang lhan
185a2('dul ba): cig phrad nas 'gyel ba dang / bub par gyur nas/ ma dad pa rnams 'phags pa dag mi mthong ngam/ ci zhes co 'dri bar byed pa dang / de dag rnal 'byor bsgom mo zhes zer ba'i skabs
185a3('dul ba): de| bcom ldan 'das la dge slong rnams kyis gsol ba dang / bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ spyod yul du zhugs pas rnal 'byor bsgom par mi bya'o/ /de dag sgo khang du rnal
185a4('dul ba): 'byor sgom par byed pa na yur nas/ ma dad pa rnams 'phags pa dag /ci khyod 'du bar nyal ba'i brtul zhugs can yin nam zhes co 'dri bar byed pa'i skabs de/ bcom ldan 'das
185a5('dul ba): la dge slong rnams kyi sa gsol ba dang / bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ sgo khang du rnal 'byor bsgom par mi bya'o/ /de dag khyams su sgom par byed pa na nyes dmigs de nyid
185a6('dul ba): du gyur nas/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ khyams su rnal 'byor bsgom par mi bya'o/ /de dag gnas khang du sgom par byed pa na/ bsam gtan dag gi tsher ma ni sgra yin pas/
185a7('dul ba): sems rtse gcig pa nyid kyang mi thob pa'i skabs de/ bcom ldan 'das la dge slong rnams kyis gsol ba dang / bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ gnas khang du rnal 'byor sgom
185b1('dul ba): par mi bya'o/ /de dag dgon par dong ste/ sgom par byed pa na/ chom rkun pa rnams dang / g.yon can rnams dang / seng ge rnams dang / stag rnams dang / gung rnams dang / gzig rnams
185b2('dul ba): kyis bgrod par gyur pa'i skabs de/ bcom ldan 'das la dge slong rnams kyis gsol pa dang / bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa dang / dgon par rnal 'byor bsgom par mi bya'o/ /de dag
185b3('dul ba): grong dang nye bar lhags nas sgom par byed pa na/ ma dad pa rnams 'phags pa dag /ci khyed cag 'ga' shi ba dang ldan par ma gyur tam/ zhes co 'dri bar byed pa'i skabs de/ bcom ldan
185b4('dul ba): 'das la dge slong rnams kyis gsol pa dang / bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ phyogs der yal ga dag gam/ seg dag gam/ re lde dag gis bskor bar bya'o/ /de dag gis phyogs de yal
185b5('dul ba): ga dag gam/ seg dag gam/ re lde dag gis bskor ba dang / ma dad pa rnams 'phags pa dag /ci 'di rgyal mo ga gon gyis ra ba'am/ la phug gi ra ba'am/ zhes co 'dri bar byed pa'i skabs
185b6('dul ba): de| bcom ldan 'das la dge slong rnams kyis gsol pa dang / bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ phyogs de rtsig pa dag gam/ 'obs dag gis bskor bar bya'o/ /de dag gis phyogs
185b7('dul ba): de rtsig pa dag gam/ 'obs dag gis bskor ba dang / ma dad pa rnams 'phags pa dag/ ci 'dri ma du lung ga'i ra ba'am/ 'on te bal po se'u'i ra ba yin/ de rnams kyis smras pa/ rnal
186a1('dul ba): 'byor bsgom pa'o zhes zer ba'i skabs de/ bcom ldan 'das la dge slong rnams kyis gsol pa dang / bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ de lta bas na spong khang
186a2('dul ba): brtsig par gnang ngo / /bcom ldan 'das kyis spong khang brtsig par bya'o/ /zhes bka' stsal nas/ de dag gis spong khang rnams ji lta bu yin par mi shes pa'i skabs de/ bcom ldan 'das la
186a3('dul ba): dge slong rnams kyis gsol pa dang / bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ spong khang ni gnyis te/ chung ngu dang / chen po'o/ /chung ngu ni gnas khang gnyis kyi bar du srang gtod pa'o/ /chen
186a4('dul ba): po ni gnas khang bcu'am/ bcu gnyis kyi bar du srang gtod pa'o/ /dge slong dag gis gnas khang byas nas sbyang byed pa bzhin du sgo dod par mi byed nas/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal
186a5('dul ba): ba| sgo dod par bya'o/ /dge slong dag sgo glegs mi 'dzud nas/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ sgo glegs gzhug par bya'o/ /dbye dka' nas/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal
186a6('dul ba): pa| lag zungs gdags par bya'o/ /yang mig sgra 'khrol nas bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ 'og tu ko ba'i dum bu gzhug par bya'o/ /gcad dka' nas/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bka'
186a7('dul ba): stsal pa/ gnam zer dang / 'khor gtan dang / phred gtan gzhug bar bya'o/ /mun nag nas bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ skar khung gdod par bya'o/ /dma' bar btod pa na/ chom
186b1('dul ba): rkun pa dang / g.yon can dang / seng ge dang / stag dang / gung rnams kyis bgrod par gyur nas/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ dma' bar gdod par mi bya'o/ /mthon por btod pa na snang ba mi
186b2('dul ba): gsal nas/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ mthon por gdod par mi bya bar sum gnyis dor bar bya zhing / sum gnyis bor ba nas sum char gdod par bya'o/ /de dag gong gi sum
186b3('dul ba): gnyis bor te/ 'og gi sum char 'don nas/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ 'og tu sum cha bor bar gdod par bya'o/ /dge slong dag phyi yangs shing nang rub par byed nas/ bcom ldan 'das
186b4('dul ba): kyis bka' stsal pa/ skar khung rgya mtsho'i rnam pa lta bu gdod par bya ste/ phyi rub la nang yangs par bya'o/ /khwa dang mchil ba dang / phu ron dag 'jug nas/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/
186b5('dul ba): skar khung dra ba can du bya'o/ /sbrang bu tre ma pu ka dang / tre la ta dag 'jug nas/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ sgo glegs gzhug par bya'o/ /rlung gis 'byed nas/ bcom ldan 'das kyis
186b6('dul ba): bka' stsal pa/ phred gtan gzhug par bya'o/ /gcad dka' nas/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ gnam gzer dang / 'khor gtan gzhug par bya'o/ /dbye dka' nas/ bcom ldan
186b7('dul ba): 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ dbyug gu skam kha byas te/ phred gtan dang / gnam gzer dang / 'khor gtan dag gis ni gcad par bya'o/ /dbyug gu skam kha ni dbye bar bya'o/ /der stan dgos par
187a1('dul ba): gyur nas/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ sa'i steg bu dag bya'o/ /'khrang par gyur nas/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ khri'u bya'o/ /bcom ldan
187a2('dul ba): 'das kyis khri'u bya'o zhes bka' stsal nas/ de dag gis khri'u ci 'dra ba mi shes nas/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ kho ra khor yug tu khru bzhis 'khor ba'i khri'u bya zhing / de thags
187a3('dul ba): mas bla bar bya'o/ /de dag gi thags ma du yod mi shes na/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ thags ma ni lnga ste/ mun dza'i dang / sha na'i dang / gres ma'i dang / ras ma'i dang / sba phra
187a4('dul ba): mo'i 'o/ /de dag 'khrang bar gyur nas/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ stan nang tshangs can dag gding bar bya'o/ /bcom ldan 'das kyis stan nang tshangs can dag gding bar bya'o zhes
187a5('dul ba): bka' stsal nas/ de dag gis stan nang tshangs can ci 'dra ba mi shes nas/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ srid du khru bzhi pa zheng du khru do yod pa nyis ltab tu byas te drub par bya'o/ /de'i
187a6('dul ba): nang du shing bal gyis dgang bar bya'o/ /de dag gis shing bal du yod mi shes nas/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ shing bal dag ni lnga ste/ arka'i shing bal dang / ka sha'i
187a7('dul ba): shing bal dang / er kha'i shing bal dang / spra ba'i shing bal dang / shal ma li'i shing bal yin no/ /gzhan yang lnga ste/ bal dang / sha na'i shing bal dang / ras bal dang / ras ma dang / lo
187b1('dul ba): ma'i tshogs dag gis bkang ba dag yin no/ /shing bal thams cad phyogs gcig tu 'chugs nas/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ mdo mdor skud pas bya rog rkang gi gzungs gdab
187b2('dul ba): par bya'o/ /'khod pa na yur nas/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ gdos bu gdags par bya'o/ /ji ltar gdags mi shes nas/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ skud
187b3('dul ba): pas btags te rna ba la gdags par bya'o/ /'on kyang yur nas/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ dbyug gu gzugs par bya'o/ /dge slong dag dbyug gu smyu gu'i bcad 'phro lta bus
187b4('dul ba): 'dzugs pa na/ rma byung nas/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ bre'i bcad 'phro lta bur bya'o/ /'on kyang snad nas/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ ras ma dag gis dkris nas
187b5('dul ba): dal bus khad kyis khad kyis gzugs par bya'o/ /'on kyang yur nas/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ pho long 'phang bar bya'o/ /dge slong dag gis mun khung du 'phangs pa na/ de 'khyams
187b6('dul ba): nas bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ thags gus btags te 'phang bar bya zhing / de nas yang phyir drang bar bya'o/ /'on kyang yur nas/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ mdun du mar
187b7('dul ba): me gzhag par bya'o/ /'on kyang yur nas/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ rkang pa gcig brkyang bar bya'o/ /'on kyang yur nas/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ rkang pa ya gcig kyang
188a1('dul ba): brkyang bar bya'o/ /'on kyang yur nas/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ langs te bcag par bya'o/ /dge slong dag 'chag pa na 'thom nas/ bcom ldan
188a2('dul ba): 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ 'phred thag la 'ju bar bya'o/ /lag pas chang rgyud byed nas/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ sbu bu bskon la skud pas btags pa la 'jus te/
188a3('dul ba): bcag par bya'o/ /mchil lham dang bcas pa 'chag par byed pa na sgra byung nas/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ mchil lham gyis gcag par mi bya'o/ /rdul gyis rkang pa
188a4('dul ba): gnyis ma rungs nas/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ par thang gding bar bya'o/ /snums par gyur nas/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ dge slong dag ngas spong ba
188a5('dul ba): pa'i kun tu spyod pa'i chos dag bca' bar bya ste/ dge slong spong ba pas zhag gsum zhing gsum zhing rkang pa gnyis bsku bar bya'o/ /dge slong spong ba pas kun tu spyod pa'i chos ji ltar bcas
188a6('dul ba): pa dag yang dag par blangs te 'jug par mi byed na 'gal tshabs can du 'gyur ro/ /de dag der mi shong nas/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ steng du rim khang gnyis pa bya'o//
188a7('dul ba): 'jeg dga' nas/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ them skas bya'o/ /lhung bar gyur nas/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ kha khyer gyis bskor bar bya'o/ /de 'phrul nas/
188b1('dul ba): bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ lcags kyi gzer bu dag gis gdab par bya'o/ /'on kyang mi shong nas/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ phyi rol tu spong khang chen po
188b2('dul ba): bya'o/ /de dag sgo sprod dag tu byed pa na/ de dag phan tshun snang nas/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ sgo snol mar gdod par bya'o/ /sgo khang bya'o/ /phug kyang bya'o/ /de dag
188b3('dul ba): de na yur nas/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ sgo drung du snam bu'am/ ras dpyangs te nyal bar bya zhing / 'di la 'gyod par mi bya'o/ /de dag de nas song zhing yang phyis
188b4('dul ba): 'ongs nas/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ dge slong spong ba'i zhal ta byed pa bsko bar bya ste/ dge slong spong ba'i zhal ta byed pa chos lnga dang ldan pa ni ma bskos pa yang bsko bar
188b5('dul ba): mi bya la/ bskos pa yang dbyung bar bya ste/ lnga gang zhe na/ 'dun pas 'gro ba dang / zhe sdang gis 'gro ba dang / gti mug gis 'gro ba dang / 'jigs pas 'gro ba dang / spong ba
188b6('dul ba): la tron byas pa dang ma byas pa mi shes pa ste/ dge slong spong ba pa'i zhal ta byed pa chos lnga po de dag dang ldan pa ni ma bskos pa yang bsko bar mi bya la/ bskos pa yang dbyung bar bya'o/ /
188b7('dul ba): dge slong spong ba'i zhal ta byed pa chos lnga dag dang ldan pa ni/ ma bskos pa yang bsko bar bya la/ bskos pa yang dbyung bar mi bya ste/ lnga gang zhe na/ 'dun pas mi 'gro ba dang / zhe sdang
189a1('dul ba): gis mi 'gro ba dang / gti mug gis mi 'gro ba dang / 'jigs bas mi 'gro ba dang / spong ba la tron byas pa dang ma byas pa shes pa ste/ dge slong spong ba'i
189a2('dul ba): zhal ta byed pa/ chos lnga po de dag dang ldan pa ni/ ma bskos pa yang bsko bar bya la/ bskos pa yang dbyung bar mi bya'o/ /'di ltar bsko bar bya ste/ je dang por spro bar bya ste/ ming
189a3('dul ba): 'di zhes bya ba khyod dge 'dun gyi spong ba ba'i zhal ta byed par spro 'am zhes dri bar bya'o/ /gal te spro na des spro zhes brjod par bya'o/ /de'i 'og tu des gnas mal bshams pa byas nas/
189a4('dul ba): gaN+Di brdungs te dris pa'i tshig gis dge slong rnams la yang dag par bsgo ba nas dge 'dun thams cad 'dug cing mthun par gyur la/ dge slong gcig gis gsol ba byas te las
189a5('dul ba): bya'o/ /dge 'dun btsun pa rnams gsan du gsol/ dge slong ming 'di zhes bgyi ba 'di dge 'dun gyi spong ba'i zhal ta bgyid par spro na/ gal te dge 'dun gyis dus la bab cing
189a6('dul ba): bzod na/ dge 'dun gyis gnang bar mdzod cig dang / dge 'dun gyis dge slong ming 'di zhes bgyi ba 'di dge 'dun gyi spong ba'i zhal ta bgyid par bsko ste/ dge slong ming 'di zhes
189a7('dul ba): bgyi ba 'di dge 'dun gyi spong ba'i zhal ta bgyid do/ /'di ni gsol ba'o/ /las ni 'di ltar bya ste/ dge 'dun btsun pa rnams gsan du gsol/ dge slong ming 'di zhes bgyi ba 'di
189b1('dul ba): dge 'dun gyi spong ba'i zhal ta bgyid par spro ste/ de'i slad du dge slong ming 'di zhes bgyi ba 'di/ dge 'dun gyi spong ba'i zhal ta bgyid par bsko zhing / dge slong ming 'di zhes bgyi
189b2('dul ba): ba 'di dge 'dun gyi spong ba'i zhal ta bgyid na/ tshe dang ldan pa gang dag dge slong ming 'di zhes bgyi ba 'di/ dge 'dun gyi spong ba'i zhal ta bgyid par bsko zhing / dge slong ming 'di
189b3('dul ba): zhes bgyi ba 'di dge 'dun gyi spong ba'i zhal ta bgyid par bzod pa de dag ni cang ma gsungs shig / gang dag mi bzod pa de dag ni gsungs shig /dge 'dun gyis bzod cing
189b4('dul ba): gnang nas/ dge 'dun gyi dge slong ming 'di zhes bgyi ba 'di/ dge 'dun gyi spong ba'i zhal ta bgyid par bskos shing / dge slong ming 'di zhes bgyi ba 'di/ dge 'dun gyi spong ba'i
189b5('dul ba): zhal ta bgyid de/ 'di ltar cang mi gsung bas de de bzhin du 'dzin to/ /dge slong dag ngas dge slong spong ba'i zhal ta byed pa'i kun tu spyod pa'i chos rnams bca' bar bya ste/ dge slong
189b6('dul ba): spong ba'i zhal ta byed pas/ spong khang du chag chag gdab par bya'o/ /phyag dar bya'o/ /lci ba sar pa'i byug pas bsku bar bya'o/ /stan bsham par bya'o/ /bshang ba'i sa dang / gci ba'i sa
189b7('dul ba): byi dor bya'o/ /chag chag gdab bar bya'o/ /phyag dar bya'o/ /lci ba sar pa'i byug pas bsku bar bya'o/ /lo ma'i chang bu gzhag par bya'o/ /bong rdog dang sa dang chu gzhag par bya'o/ /de dag re re'i
190a1('dul ba): gan du song ste/ 'bod par byed nas/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ re re nas bod par mi bya bar gaN+DI brdung bar bya'o/ /de gaN+DI rgya cher brdungs ba dang / ji tsam na spyod yul
190a2('dul ba): gyi grong mi rnams chom rkun pha ma 'ongs sam zhe sdangs nas/ de rnams go bgos te lhags nas/ 'phags pa dag ci chom rkun pa dag mchis sam/ de rnams kyis smras pa/ shes ldan dag chom rkun pa dag
190a3('dul ba): ma lhags te/ 'di ltar spong ba la tron byed do/ /de rnams kyis smras pa/ 'phags pa dag rnam par 'tshe ba la tron mdzad kyi/ 'di na spong ba ga la mchis zhes zer ba'i skabs de/ bcom ldan 'das la dge
190a4('dul ba): slong rnams kyis gsol pa dang / bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ gaN+DI rgya cher brdung bar mi bya ste/ 'di ltar gaN+DI ni lnga ste/ dge 'dun bsdu ba'i gaN+DI dang / las kyi gaN+DI dang / shi ba'i gaN+DI dang / spong ba'i
190a5('dul ba): gaN+DI dang / gnod pa byung ba'i gaN+DI'o/ /de la dge 'dun bsdu ba'i gaN+DI ni rgyud gsum dang tog gsum pa'o/ /las kyi gaN+DI ni rgyud gcig dang tog gsum mo/ /shi ba'i gaN+DI ni byi ba'o/ /spong ba'i gaN+DI ni 'khar gsil lo/ /
190a6('dul ba): gnod pa byung ba'i gaN+DI ni ji tsam gyis chog pa'o/ /de dag dus gting la thug pa na ci bder byed nas/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ gting la thug pa na ci bder mi bya bar dus shes par byas nas ci bder
190a7('dul ba): byas te/ dge 'dun las tshal ma 'thob pa gang dag yin pa de dag kyang khrus byas nas dge 'dun gyi nang du 'du khom pa dang / bsod snyoms pa gang dag yin pa de dag kyang rkang lag gnyis bkrus nas/ grong
190b1('dul ba): du bsod snyoms la 'jug khom par bya'o/ /de dag de kho na bzhin du ci bder byed nas/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal ba/ de kho na bzhin du ci bder mi bya bar rgyud chags gsum pa gdon par bya'o//
190b2('dul ba): de dag ha cang mang du 'don par byed nas/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ ha cang mang du gdon par mi bya'o/ /de dag ha cang nyung dur 'don par byed nas/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ ha
190b3('dul ba): cang nyung dur gdon par mi bya ste/ 'di ltar rin par gdon par bya'o/ /de dag yon bshad par mi byed nas/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ yon bshad par bya'o/ /bcom ldan 'das kyis yon bshad par
190b4('dul ba): bya'o zhes bkang stsal nas/ de dag gis sus yon bshad par bya ba mi shes nas/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ dge 'dun gyi gnas brtan gyis yon bshad par bya'o/ /de dag yon bshad pa ha cang
190b5('dul ba): mang du byed nas/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ yon bshad pa ha cang mang du mi bya'o/ /de dag yon bshad pa ha cang nyung dur byed nas/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ yon bshad pa ha cang nyung
190b6('dul ba): dur mi bya ste/ 'di ltar yon bshad pa ran par bya'o/ /dge slong spong ba'i zhal ta byed pa thams cad kyi mjug tu 'du zhing / thams cad kyi mdun du 'gyes par byed nas/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ dge slong
190b7('dul ba): spong ba'i zhal ta byed pa thams cad kyi mjug tu 'gyes par bya zhing / thams cad kyi mdun du 'du bar bya'o/ /gal te rkyen de lta bu byung na/ des phyogs dben par lde mig sbas te/ tshe dang ldan pa kho bos phyogs ga ge mo
191a1('dul ba): zhig tu lde mig sbas kyis phye la zhugs shig ces brjod par bya'o/ /dge slong spong ba'i zhal ta byed pas kun tu spyad pa'i chos ji ltar bcas pa yang dag par blangs te mi 'jug na
191a2('dul ba): 'gal tshabs can du 'gyur ro/ /de ni 'dug pa zhes bya'o/ /bya ba gang zhe na/ dge 'dun gyi gsol ba dang / gsol ba dang gnyis dang / gsol ba dang bzhi'i las gang yin pa 'di ni bya ba zhes
191a3('dul ba): bya'o/ /gso sbyong gang zhe na/ dge slong dag ngas so sor thar pa'i mdo gdon pa gang yin pa ste/ de khyed kyis deng phyin chad zla ba phyed phyed cing gdon par bya'o/ /bcom ldan 'das kyis zla ba phyed phyed cing
191a4('dul ba): so sor thar pa'i mdo gdon pa 'don par bya'o/ /zhes bka' stsal nas/ de dag gis sus gdon par bya ba mi shes nas/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ dge 'dun gyi gnas brtan gyis zla ba
191a5('dul ba): phyed phyed cing so sor thar pa'i mdo gdon pa 'don par bya'o/ /bcom ldan 'das kyis dge 'dun gyi gnas brtan gyis/ zla ba phyed phyed cing so sor thar pa'i mdo gdon pa 'don par bya'o zhes bka' stsal nas/ dge
191a6('dul ba): slong dag de'i gnas khang du 'du bar byed pa na de dag der mi shong ba'i skabs de/ bcom ldan 'das la dge slong rnams kyis gsol pa dang / bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ gnas khang du gdon
191a7('dul ba): par mi bya'o/ /de dag khyams su 'don par byed pa na/ der yang mi shong nas/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ dge 'dun gyis gso sbyong gi gnas la blo mthun par bya'o/ /bcom ldan 'das
191b1('dul ba): kyis dge 'dun gyi gso sbyong gi gnas la blo mthun par bya'o zhes bka' stsal nas/ de dag gis gang la blo mthun par bya ba mi shes nas/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ gnas thams cad grub
191b2('dul ba): pa'am/ byas pa'am/ zin pa nang mtshams dang / phyi rol nye 'khor 'dom gang dang bcas pa 'di dge 'dun gyi gso sbyong gi gnas su 'dod pa gang yin pa de la blo mthun par bya'o/ /'di ltar blo mthun par bya ste/
191b3('dul ba): gnas mal bsham pa byas nas gaN+DI brdungs te/ dris pa'i tshig gis dge slong rnams la yang dag par bsgo nas/ dge 'dun thams cad 'dug cing mthun par gyur pa la/ dge slong gcig gis gsol ba byas
191b4('dul ba): te las bya'o/ /dge 'dun btsun pa rnams gsan du gsol/ gnas thams cad grub pa'am/ bgyis pa'am/ lags pa nang mtshams dang / phyi rol nye 'khor 'dom gang dang bcas pa 'di dge 'dun gyi
191b5('dul ba): gso sbyong gi gnas su bzhed na/ gal te dge 'dun gyis dus la bab cing bzod na/ dge 'dun gyis gnang bar mdzod cig dang / dge 'dun gyis gnas thams cad grub pa'am/ bgyis pa'am/ lags pa
191b6('dul ba): nang mtshams dang / phyi rol nye 'khor 'dom gang dang bcas pa 'di la/ dge 'dun gyi gso sbyong gi gnas su blo mthun par bgyi'o/ /'di ni gsol ba'o/ /las ni 'di ltar bya ste/ dge 'dun btsun pa rnams
191b7('dul ba): gsan du gsol/ gnas thams cad grub pa'am/ bgyis pa'am/ lags pa nang mtshams dang / phyi rol nye 'khor 'dom gang dang bcas pa 'di dge 'dun gyi gso sbyong gi gnas su bzhed de/ de'i slad du
192a1('dul ba): dge 'dun gyi gnas thams cad grub pa'am/ bgyis pa'am/ lags pa nang mtshams dang / phyi rol nye 'khor 'dom gang dang bcas ba 'di la/ dge 'dun gyi gso
192a2('dul ba): sbyong gi gnas su blo mthun par bgyi na tshe dang ldan pa gang dag gnas thams cad grub pa'am/ bgyis pa'am/ lags pa nang mtshams dang / phyi rol nye 'khor 'dom gang dang bcas pa 'di
192a3('dul ba): la| dge 'dun gyi gso sbyong gi gnas su blo mthun par bgyi bar bzod pa de dag ni cang ma gsungs shig / gang dag mi bzod pa de dag ni gsungs shig /dge 'dun gyis bzod cing gnang nas/ dge
192a4('dul ba): 'dun gyis gnas thams cad grub pa'am/ bgyis pa'am/ lags pa nang mtshams dang / phyi rol nye 'khor 'dom gang dang bcas pa 'di la/ dge 'dun gyi gso sbyong gi gnas su blo mthun par
192a5('dul ba): bgyis lags te/ 'di ltar cang mi gsung bas/ de de bzhin du 'dzin to/ /gang du dge 'dun gyi gso sbyong gi gnas su blo mthun par byas pa der/ dge slong rnams kyis 'dug la/ gso sbyong dang
192a6('dul ba): dgag dbye dang / gsol ba dang / gsol ba dang gnyis dang / gsol ba dang bzhi las bya'o/ /mi mthun par byed na 'gal tshabs can du 'gyur ro// //'dul ba gzhi/bam po bcu gnyis
192a7('dul ba): pa| sdom la/ ka pi na dang chos gos dang / /dgrol dang mtshams chung mtshams chen dang / /gnang dang bskyung bskyed dgrol ba dang / /gcad dang mi 'bral ma bcad dang / /grong dgon las dang
192b1('dul ba): dgon pa yi/ /sde tshan yang dag bsdus pa yin/ /sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rgyal po'i khab 'od ma'i tshal ka lan da kwa'i gnas na bzhugs so/ /de'i tshe na tshe dang ldan pa bram ze ka pi na/ rgyal po'i khab na sde
192b2('dul ba): can ma'i phug na gso sbyong gcig pa'i gnas kyi sdom pas dge 'dun dang mthun par 'dug go / de nas dge slong rab tu mang po dag gso sbyong bco lnga pa de nyid kyi tshe/ gso sbyong gi gnas su 'dug cing mthun par
192b3('dul ba): gyur nas/ shas cher tshe dang ldan pa bram ze ka pi na la sdod cing 'khod do/ /de nas tshe dang ldan pa bram ze ka pi na 'di snyam du sems te/ deng dge 'dun gyi gso sbyong bco lnga pa yin la/ bdag dge slong ka pi na'i
192b4('dul ba): gso sbyong yang bco lnga pa yin na/ ci dge 'dun gyi gso sbyong gi gnas su 'gro bar bya'am/ 'on te dge 'dun gyi gso sbyong gi gnas su 'gro ba mi bya/ ci dge 'dun dang lhan cig gso sbyong nyams su myong bar
192b5('dul ba): bya'am/ 'on te dge 'dun dang lhan cig gso sbyong nyams su myong bar mi bya/ ci dge 'dun gyi bya ba dag dang dge 'dun gyi byed pa dag tu 'gro bar bya'am/ 'on te dge 'dun gyi bya ba dag dang dge 'dun gyi byed
192b6('dul ba): pa dag tu 'gro bar mi bya/ ci dge 'dun dang lhan cig dge 'dun gyi bya ba dag dang / dge 'dun gyi byed pa dag nyams su myong bar bya'am/ 'on te dge 'dun dang lhan cig dge 'dun gyi bya ba dag dang / dge 'dun
192b7('dul ba): gyi byed pa dag nyams su myong bar mi bya/ bcom ldan 'das kyis kyang / rtag tu dag pa snying po ste/ /rtag tu dag pa gso sbyong yin/ /gtsang ma'i las ni dag gyur pa/ /de yi brtul zhugs 'grub par 'gyur//
193a1('dul ba): zhes bka' stsal pas/ bdag ni dag cing mchog tu dag pa dang ldan no snyam mo/ /de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis/ tshe dang ldan pa bram ze ka pi na'i sems kyis yongs su
193a2('dul ba): rtog pa thugs su chud nas/ 'od ma'i tshal nas mi snang bar mdzad de/ sde can ma'i phug tu tshe dang ldan pa bram ze ka pi na'i mdun du bzhugs te/ 'di skad ces bka' stsal to/ /ka pi na khyod gcig pu
193a3('dul ba): dben par song ste/ nang du yang dag 'jog pa na/ 'di snyam du dge 'dun gyi gso sbyong ni bco lnga pa yin la/ bdag dge slong ka pi na'i gso sbyong yang bco lnga pa yin na/ ci dge 'dun gyi gso sbyong gi
193a4('dul ba): gnas su 'gro bar bya'am/ 'on te dge 'dun gyi gso sbyong gi gnas su 'gro bar mi bya/ ci dge 'dun dang lhan cig gso sbyong nyams su myong bar bya'am/ 'on te dge 'dun dang lhan cig gso sbyong
193a5('dul ba): nyams su myong bar mi bya/ ci dge 'dun gyi bya ba dag dang / dge 'dun gyi byed pa dag tu 'gro bar bya'am/ 'on te dge 'dun gyi bya ba dag dang / dge 'dun gyi byed pa dag tu 'gro bar mi bya/ ci dge
193a6('dul ba): 'dun dang lhan cig dge 'dun gyi bya ba dag dang / dge 'dun gyi byed pa dag nyams su myong bar bya'am/ 'on te dge 'dun dang lhan cig dge 'dun gyi bya ba dag dang / dge 'dun gyi byed pa dag
193a7('dul ba): nyams su myong bar mi bya/ bcom ldan 'das kyis kyang / rtag tu dag pa snying po ste/ /rtag tu dag pa gso sbyong yin/ /gtsang ma'i las ni dag gyur pa/ /de yi brtul zhugs 'grub par 'gyur/ /
193b1('dul ba): zhes bka' stsal pas/ bdag ni dag cing mchog tu dag pa dang ldan no snyam du sems la sems kyi yongs su rtog pa ma byung ngam/ btsun pa byung ngo / /ka pi na khyod re zhig dge 'dun gyi gso sbyong gi
193b2('dul ba): gnas su mi 'gro na/ gzhan su zhig 'gro bar 'gyur/ khyod dge 'dun dang lhan cig gso sbyong nyams su myong bar mi byed na/ gzhan su zhig nyams su myong bar byed par 'gyur/ khyod dge 'dun gyi bya
193b3('dul ba): ba dag dang / dge 'dun gyi byed pa dag tu mi 'gro na/ gzhan su zhig 'gro bar 'gyur/ khyod dge 'dun dang lhan cig dge 'dun gyi bya ba dag dang / dge 'dun gyi byed pa dag nyams su myong bar mi byed na/
193b4('dul ba): gzhan su zhig nyams su myong bar byed/ ka pi na de lta bas na/ khyod dge 'dun gyi gso sbyong gi gnas su mi 'gro bar ma byed par song zhig /ka pi na khyod dge 'dun gyi gso sbyong nyams su mi myong bar
193b5('dul ba): ma byed par nyams su myong bar byos shig / ka pi na khyod dge 'dun gyi bya ba dag dang / dge 'dun gyi byed pa dag tu mi 'gro bar mi byed par song zhig /ka pi na khyod dge 'dun dang lhan cig dge 'dun
193b6('dul ba): gyi bya ba dag dang / dge 'dun gyi byed pa dag nyams su mi myong bar ma byed par nyams su myong bar gyis shig/ de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis tshe dang ldan pa bram ze ka pi na khrid nas/ gso sbyong gi
193b7('dul ba): gnas ga la bar gshegs te/ byon nas dge slong gi dge 'dun gyi gung la gdan bshams pa nyid la bzhugs so/ /bzhugs nas bcom ldan 'das kyis dge slong rnams la bka' stsal pa/ dge
194a1('dul ba): slong dag de lta bas na/ dge slong dag gis gso sbyong gcig pa'i gnas kyi sdom pas mtshams chen po bcad pa rjes su gnang ngo / /bcom ldan 'das kyis
194a2('dul ba): gso sbyong gcig pa'i gnas kyi sdom pas mtshams chen po gcad par bya'o zhes bka' stsal nas/ dge slong rnams kyis ji ltar gcad par bya ba mi shes nas/ bcom ldan 'das
194a3('dul ba): kyis bka' stsal pa/ je dang por dge slong gnas pa dang / gnyug mar gnas pa rnams kyis mtshams chen po phyogs bzhi'i mtshan ma brtan po/ shar phyogs su ni pha bong gi mtshan
194a4('dul ba): ma'am/ rtsig pa'i mtshan ma'am/ ka ba'i mtshan ma'am/ shing ljon pa'i mtshan ma'am/ ra ba'i mtshan ma'am/ bya skyibs kyi mtshan ma'am/ lam po che'i mtshan ma'am/
194a5('dul ba): khron pa la sogs pa'i mtshan ma brtan po gzugs par bya'o/ /lho phyogs dang / nub phyogs dang / byang phyogs su yang pha bong gi mtshan ma'am/ rtsig pa'i mtshan ma'am/ ka ba'i
194a6('dul ba): mtshan ma'am/ shing ljon pa'i mtshan ma'am/ ra ba'i mtshan ma'am/ bya skyibs kyi mtshan ma'am/ lam po che'i mtshan ma'am/ khron pa la sogs pa'i mtshan ma brtan po gzugs par bya'o//
194a7('dul ba): de'i 'og tu gnas mal bsham par byas nas/ gaN+DI brdungs te dris pa'i tshig gis dge slong rnams la yang dag par bsgo nas/ dge 'dun thams cad 'dug cing mthun par gyur la/ dge slong
194b1('dul ba): gnas pa dang / gnyug mar gnas pa rnams kyi mtshams chen po'i phyogs bzhi'i mtshan ma brtan por shar phyogs su ni pha bong gi mtshan ma'am/ rtsig pa'i mtshan ma'am/ ka ba'i mtshan
194b2('dul ba): ma'am/ shing ljon pa'i mtshan ma'am/ ra ba'i mtshan ma'am/ bya skyibs kyi mtshan ma'am/ lam po che'i mtshan ma'am/ khron pa la sogs pa'i mtshan ma brtan po brjod par bya'o/ /lho phyogs
194b3('dul ba): dang / nub phyogs dang / byang phyogs su yang pha bong gi mtshan ma'am/ rtsig pa'i mtshan ma'am/ ka ba'i mtshan ma'am/ shing ljon pa'i mtshan ma'am/ ra ba'i mtshan ma'am/ bya skyibs
194b4('dul ba): kyi mtshan ma'am/ lam po che'i mtshan ma'am/ khron pa la sogs pa'i mtshan ma brtan po brjod par bya'o/ /de 'og tu dge slong gcig gis gsol ba byas te las bya'o/ /dge 'dun btsun
194b5('dul ba): pa rnams gsan du gsol/ 'di lta ste gnas 'di na dge slong gnas pa dang / gnyug mar gnas pa rnams kyis mtshams chen po'i phyogs bzhi'i mtshan ma brtan po brjod pa/ shar phyogs
194b6('dul ba): su ni pha bong gi mtshan ma'am/ rtsig pa'i mtshan ma brtan po lags/ lho phyogs su ni ka ba'i mtshan ma'am/ shing ljon pa'i mtshan ma brtan po lags/ nub phyogs su ni ra ba'i mtshan ma'am/
194b7('dul ba): bya skyibs kyi mtshan ma brtan po lags/ byang phyogs su ni lam po che'i mtshan ma'am/ khron pa la sogs pa'i mtshan ma brtan po lags na gal te dge 'dun gyi dus la bab cing bzod na/ dge
195a1('dul ba): 'dun gyis gnang bar mdzod cig dang / dge 'dun gyis mtshan ma 'di rnams kyi nang du gso sbyong gcig pa'i gnas kyi sdom pas 'di lta ste/ gnas bsdu
195a2('dul ba): ba dang / dge slong rnams bde ba la reg par gnas par bgyi ba'i slad du/ dge 'dun gyis grong dang / grong gi nye 'khor ma gtogs par dgon pa la thug pa dang / gnas
195a3('dul ba): mal la thug pa'i bar du mtshams chen po gcod do/ /'di ni gsol ba'o/ /las ni 'di ltar bya ste/ dge 'dun btsun pa rnams gsan du gsol/ 'di lta ste/ gnas 'di na
195a4('dul ba): dge slong gnas pa dang / gnyug mar gnas pa rnams kyi mtshams chen po'i phyogs bzhi'i mtshan ma brtan po brjod pa/ shar phyogs su ni pha bong gi mtshan ma'am/ rtsig pa'i
195a5('dul ba): mtshan ma brtan po lags/ lho phyogs su ni ka ba'i mtshan ma'am/ shing ljon pa'i mtshan ma brtan po lags/ nub phyogs su ni ra ba'i mtshan ma'am/ bya skyibs kyi mtshan
195a6('dul ba): ma brtan po lags/ byang phyogs su ni lam po che'i mtshan ma'am/ khron pa la sogs pa'i mtshan ma brtan po lags te/ de'i slad du dge 'dun gyis mtshan ma 'di rnams kyi
195a7('dul ba): nang du/ gso sbyong gcig pa'i gnas kyi sdom pas 'di lta ste/ gnas bsdu ba dang / dge slong rnams bde ba la reg par gnas par bgyi ba'i slad du/ grong dang grong gi nye
195b1('dul ba): 'khor ma gtogs par dgon pa la thug pa dang / gnas mal la thug pa'i bar du mtshams chen po gcod na/ tshe dang ldan pa gang dag mtshan ma 'di rnams kyi nang du gso sbyong gcig
195b2('dul ba): pa'i gnas kyi sdom pas 'di lta ste/ gnas bsdu ba dang / dge slong rnams bde ba la reg par gnas par bgyi ba'i slad du/ grong dang grong gi nye 'khor ma gtogs par dgon pa la thug
195b3('dul ba): pa dang / gnas mal la thug pa'i bar du mtshams chen po gcad par bzod pa de dag ni cang ma gsungs shig /gang dag mi bzod pa de dag ni gsungs shig/ dge 'dun gyis bzod cing
195b4('dul ba): gnang nas/ dge 'dun gyis mtshan ma 'di rnams kyi nang du gso sbyong gcig pa'i gnas kyi sdom pas 'di lta ste/ gnas bsdu ba dang / dge slong rnams bde ba la reg par gnas par bgyi ba'i
195b5('dul ba): slad du/ grong dang grong gi nye 'khor ma gtogs par dgon pa la thug pa dang / gnas mal la thug pa'i bar du mtshams chen po bcad lags te/ 'di ltar cang mi gsung bas de de bzhin
195b6('dul ba): du 'dzin to/ /dge 'dun gyis gang du mtshams chen po bcad pa der dge slong rnams kyis 'dug ste/ gso sbyong bya zhing dgag dbye dang / gsol ba dang / gsol ba dang gnyis dang / gsol
195b7('dul ba): ba dang bzhi'i las bya'o/ /mi mthun bar byed na 'gal tshabs can du 'gyur ro/ /dge slong rnams chos gos gsum thogs te/ nyin mo spyod du 'dong ba na/ skyo bar gyur pa'i skabs de/ bcom
196a1('dul ba): ldan 'das la dge slong rnams kyis gsol pa dang / bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ mtshams chen po'i nang du dge slong thams cad kyi chos gos dag
196a2('dul ba): dang mi 'bral ba'i gnang ba sbyin par bya'o/ /'di ltar sbyin par bya ste/ gnas mal bsham pa byas nas/ gaN+DI brdungs te/ dris pa'i tshig gis dge slong rnams la yang dag par bsgo nas/
196a3('dul ba): dge 'dun thams cad 'dug cing mthun par gyur pa la dge slong gcig gis gsol ba byas te las bya'o/ /dge 'dun btsun pa rnams gsan du gsol/ 'di lta ste/ gnas 'dir dge 'dun
196a4('dul ba): mthun pas gso sbyong gcig pa'i gnas kyi sdom pas mtshams chen po bcad pa las/ gal te dge 'dun gyis dus la bab cing bzod na/ dge 'dun gyis gnang bar mdzod cig dang / dge
196a5('dul ba): 'dun gyis 'di lta ste/ gnas bsdu ba dang / dge slong rnams bde ba la reg par gnas par bgyi ba'i slad du/ mtshams chen po'i nang du dge slong thams cad kyi chos gos dag dang
196a6('dul ba): 'bral bar mi 'gyur ba'i gnang ba gsol to/ /'di ni gsol ba'o/ /las ni 'di ltar bya ste/ dge 'dun btsun pa rnams gsan du gsol/ 'di lta ste/ gnas 'dir dge 'dun
196a7('dul ba): mthun pas gso sbyong gcig pa'i gnas kyi sdom pas mtshams chen po bcad de/ de'i slad du dge 'dun gyis 'di lta ste/ gnas bsdu ba dang / dge slong rnams bde ba la reg par
196b1('dul ba): gnas par bgyi ba'i slad du/ mtshams chen po'i nang du dge slong thams cad kyis chos gos dag dang 'bral bar mi 'gyur ba'i gnang ba stsol na/ tshe dang ldan pa gang dag 'di lta ste/ gnas
196b2('dul ba): bsdu ba dang / dge slong rnams bde ba la reg par gnas par bgyi ba'i slad du/ mtshams chen po'i nang du dge slong thams cad kyi chos gos dag dang 'bral bar mi 'gyur ba'i gnang ba
196b3('dul ba): stsal bar bzod pa de dag ni cang ma gsungs shig/ gang dag mi bzod pa de dag ni gsungs shig/ dge 'dun gyis bzod cing gnang nas/ dge 'dun gyis mtshams chen po'i nang du dge
196b4('dul ba): slong thams cad kyi chos gos dag dang 'bral bar mi 'gyur ba'i gnang ba stsal lags te/ 'di ltar cang mi gsung bas de de bzhin du 'dzin to/ /dge 'dun gyis gang du mtshams chen po'i nang
196b5('dul ba): du dge slong rnams kyi chos gos dag dang 'bral bar mi 'gyur ba'i gnang ba byin pa dang / dge slong rnams stod g.yogs dang smad g.yogs dang bcas pas 'dong bar bya ste/ 'di la 'gyod par mi
196b6('dul ba): bya'o/ /dge slong dag la bzhi'i tshogs kyis las bya ba dag byung zhing / lnga'i tshogs kyis las bya ba dag dang / bcu'i tshogs kyis las bya ba dag byung nas/ de dag dge 'dun thams cad sdud par
196b7('dul ba): byed pa na/ dge slong rnams kyi dge ba'i phyogs yongs su nyams par gyur pa'i skabs de/ bcom ldan 'das la dge slong rnams kyis gsol pa dang / bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/
197a1('dul ba): mtshams bu chung bcad cing dkyil 'khor bar blo mthun par bya'o/ /'di ltar bcad par bya ste/ je dang por mtshams chen po dgrol bar bya'o/ /'di ltar dgrol bar
197a2('dul ba): bya ste/ gnas mal bsham pa byas nas/ gaN+DI brdungs te dris pa'i tshig gis/ dge slong rnams la yang dag par bsgo nas/ dge 'dun thams cad 'dug cing mthun par gyur pa la dge
197a3('dul ba): slong gcig gis gsol ba byas te las bya'o/ /dge 'dun btsun pa rnams gsan du gsol/ 'di lta ste/ gnas 'dir dge 'dun mthun pas gso sbyong gcig pa'i gnas kyi sdom pas mtshams
197a4('dul ba): chen po bcad pa/ gal te dge 'dun gyis dus la bab cing bzod na/ dge 'dun gyis gnang bar mdzod cig dang / dge 'dun gyis mtshams chen po gzhig cing dgrol bar mdzad do/ /'di
197a5('dul ba): ni gsol ba'o/ /las ni 'di ltar bya ste/ dge 'dun btsun pa rnams gsan du gsol/ 'di lta ste/ gnas 'dir dge 'dun mthun pas gso sbyong gcig pa'i gnas kyi sdom pas mtshams
197a6('dul ba): chen po bcad de/ de'i slad du dge 'dun gyis mtshams chen po gzhig cing dgrol bar mdzad na/ tshe dang ldan pa gang dag mtshams chen po gzhig cing dgrol ba mdzad par bzod pa de dag ni
197a7('dul ba): cang ma gsungs shig/ gang dag mi bzod pa de dag ni gsungs shig/ 'di ni las brjod pa dang po ste/ de bzhin du lan gnyis lan gsum du bzlas/ dge 'dun gyis bzod cing gnang nas/
197b1('dul ba): dge 'dun gyis mtshams chen po gzhig cing bkrol lags te/ 'di ltar cang mi gsung bas de de bzhin du 'dzin to/ /de'i 'og tu dge slong gnas pa dang / gnyug mar gnas pa rnams kyi mtshams
197b2('dul ba): bu chung gi phyogs bzhi'i mtshan ma brtan po/ shar phyogs su ni seng ldeng gi phur pa btab pa'am/ srad bu bres pa'am/ rdo bzhag pa'am/ srol gtod pa la sogs pa'i mtshan ma brtan po
197b3('dul ba): gzugs par bya'o/ /lho phyogs dang / nub phyogs dang / byang phyogs su yang seng ldeng gi phur pa btab pa'am/ srad bu bres pa'am/ srol gtod pa la sogs pa'i mtshan ma brtan po gzugs
197b4('dul ba): par bya'o/ /de'i 'og tu gnas mal bsham par byas nas/ gaN+DI brdungs te dris pa'i tshig gis/ dge slong rnams la yang dag par bsgo nas/ dge 'dun thams cad 'dug cing mthun par
197b5('dul ba): gyur pa la/ dge slong gnas pa dang / gnyug mar gnas pa rnams kyis mtshams bu chung gi phyogs bzhi'i mtshan ma brtan po/ shar phyogs su ni seng ldeng gi phur ba btab pa'am/ srad bu
